00055 #define FIXEDPT_MULTIPLY( a, b ) ( (a / 256) * (b / 256) )
00056 
00057 UINT32 FPMult32(UINT32 uiA, UINT32 uiB)
00058 {
00059 UINT32 uiResult;
00060 
00061       __asm {
00062             // Load the 32-bit registers with the two values
00063             mov         eax, uiA
00064             mov         ebx, uiB
00065 
00066             // Multiply them
00067             // Top 32 bits (whole portion) goes into edx
00068             // Bottom 32 bits (fractional portion) goes into eax
00069             imul  ebx
00070 
00071             // Shift the fractional portion back to (lower) 16 bits
00072             shr         eax, 16
00073             // Shift the whole portion to 16 bits, in the upper word
00074             shl         edx, 16
00075 
00076             // At this point, we have edx xxxx0000 and eax 0000xxxx
00077             // Combine the two words into a dword
00078             or          eax, edx
00079 
00080             // Put the result into a returnable variable
00081             mov         uiResult, eax
00082             }
00083 
00084             return(uiResult);
00085 }

00218 FIXEDPT FloatToFixed( FLOAT dN )
00219 {
00220       FIXEDPT           qN;
00221       // verify that dN is within the range storable by FIXEDPT?
00222 
00223       // first get the whole part
00224       qN = (INT32) (dN * FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION);
00225 
00226       //qN = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( (INT32)dN );
00227       // now add the fractional part
00228       //qN += (INT32)(((dN - (INT32) dN)) * FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION);
00229 
00230       return( qN );
00231 }
00232 
00233 FLOAT FixedToFloat( FIXEDPT qN )
00234 {
00235       return( ((FLOAT) qN)    / FIXEDPT_FRACTIONAL_RESOLUTION );
00236 }

00242 FLOAT Distance3D( FLOAT dDeltaX, FLOAT dDeltaY, FLOAT dDeltaZ )
00243 {
00244       return( (FLOAT) sqrt( (DOUBLE) (dDeltaX * dDeltaX + dDeltaY * dDeltaY + dDeltaZ * dDeltaZ) ));
00245 }
00246 
00247 FLOAT Distance2D( FLOAT dDeltaX, FLOAT dDeltaY )
00248 {
00249       return( (FLOAT) sqrt( (DOUBLE) (dDeltaX * dDeltaX + dDeltaY * dDeltaY )));
00250 }

00282 BOOLEAN ResolveHitOnWall( STRUCTURE * pStructure, INT32 iGridNo, INT8 bLOSIndexX, INT8 bLOSIndexY, DOUBLE ddHorizAngle )
00283 {
00284       BOOLEAN                       fNorthSouth, fEastWest;
00285       BOOLEAN                       fTopLeft, fTopRight;
00286       INT8                          bLocation = LOC_OTHER;
00287 
00288       switch ( bLOSIndexX ) 
00289       {
00290             case 0:
00291                   if ( bLOSIndexY == 4 )
00292                   {
00293                         bLocation = LOC_0_4;
00294                   }
00295                   break;
00296             case 3:
00297                   if ( bLOSIndexY == 4 )
00298                   {
00299                         bLocation = LOC_3_4;
00300                   }
00301                   break;
00302             case 4:
00303                   switch( bLOSIndexY )
00304                   {
00305                         case 0:
00306                               bLocation = LOC_4_0;
00307                               break;
00308                         case 3:
00309                               bLocation = LOC_4_3;
00310                               break;
00311                         case 4:
00312                               bLocation = LOC_4_4;
00313                               break;
00314                         default:
00315                               break;
00316                   }
00317                   break;
00318             default:
00319                   break;
00320       }
00321 
00322       if ( bLocation == LOC_OTHER )
00323       {
00324             // these spots always block
00325             return( TRUE );
00326       }
00327 
00328       // use cartesian angles for god's sakes -CJC
00329       ddHorizAngle = -ddHorizAngle;
00330 
00331       fNorthSouth = ( ( ddHorizAngle < (0) && ddHorizAngle > ( -PI * 1 / 2) ) || ( ddHorizAngle > ( PI * 1 / 2 ) && ddHorizAngle < (PI) ) );
00332       fEastWest = ( ( ddHorizAngle > (0) && ddHorizAngle < (PI * 1 / 2) ) || ( ddHorizAngle < (-PI * 1 / 2) && ddHorizAngle > ( -PI ) ) );
00333 
00334       fTopLeft = ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT );
00335       fTopRight = ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT );
00336 
00337       if ( fNorthSouth )
00338       {
00339             // Check N-S at west corner:        4,4 4,3   0,4
00340             if ( bLocation == LOC_4_3 || bLocation == LOC_4_4 )
00341             {
00342                   // if wall orientation is top-right, then check S of this location
00343                   // if wall orientation is top-left, then check E of this location
00344                   // if no wall of same orientation there, let bullet through
00345                   if ( fTopRight )
00346                   {
00347                         if (!WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH )) ) &&
00348                                     !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo) ) &&
00349                                     !OpenRightOrientedDoorWithDoorOnRightOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH )) ) )
00350                         {
00351                               return( FALSE );
00352                         }
00353                   
00354                   }
00355 
00356             }
00357             else if ( bLocation == LOC_0_4 )
00358             {
00359                   if ( fTopLeft )
00360                   { 
00361                         if ( !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( WEST )) ) &&
00362                                      !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTHWEST ) ) ) &&
00363                                      !OpenLeftOrientedDoorWithDoorOnLeftOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( WEST )) ) )
00364                         {
00365                               return( FALSE );
00366                         }
00367                   }
00368 
00369             }
00370 
00371             // Check N-S at east corner:        4,4 3,4   4,0
00372             if ( bLocation == LOC_4_4 || bLocation == LOC_3_4 )
00373             {
00374                   if ( fTopLeft )
00375                   { 
00376                         if ( !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( EAST )) ) &&
00377                                      !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo) ) &&
00378                                      !OpenLeftOrientedDoorWithDoorOnLeftOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( EAST )) ) )
00379                         {
00380                               return( FALSE );
00381                         }
00382                   }
00383             }
00384             else if ( bLocation == LOC_4_0 )
00385             {
00386                   // if door is normal and OPEN and outside type then we let N-S pass
00387                   if ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DOOR) && (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) )
00388                   {
00389                         if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_LEFT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00390                         {
00391                               return( FALSE );
00392                         }
00393                   }
00394                   else if ( fTopRight )
00395                   {
00396                         if ( !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTHEAST )) ) &&
00397                                      !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTH ) ) ) &&
00398                                      !OpenLeftOrientedDoorWithDoorOnLeftOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTHEAST )) ) )
00399                         {
00400                               return( FALSE );
00401                         }
00402                   }
00403             }
00404       }
00405 
00406       if ( fEastWest )
00407       {
00408             // Check E-W at north corner:   4,4   4,0       0,4
00409             if ( bLocation == LOC_4_4 )
00410             {
00411                   if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == NO_ORIENTATION)
00412                   {
00413                         // very top north corner of building, and going (screenwise) west or east
00414                         return( FALSE );
00415                   }
00416             }
00417             else if ( bLocation == LOC_4_0 ) 
00418             {
00419                   // maybe looking E-W at (screenwise) north corner of building
00420                   // if wall orientation is top-right, then check N of this location
00421                   // if no wall of same orientation there, let bullet through
00422                   if ( fTopRight )
00423                   {
00424                         if (!WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTH )) ) && 
00425                                     !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( NORTH )) ) )
00426                         {
00427                               return( FALSE );
00428                         }
00429                   }
00430             }
00431             else if ( bLocation == LOC_0_4 )
00432             {
00433                   // if normal door and OPEN and inside type then we let E-W pass
00434                   if ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_DOOR) && (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN) )
00435                   {
00436                         if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_LEFT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00437                         {
00438                               return( FALSE );
00439                         }
00440                   }
00441 
00442                   // if wall orientation is top-left, then check W of this location
00443                   // if no wall of same orientation there, let bullet through             
00444                   if ( fTopLeft )
00445                   {
00446                         if (!WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( WEST )) ) && 
00447                                     !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( WEST )) ) )
00448                         {
00449                               return( FALSE );
00450                         }
00451                   }
00452 
00453             }
00454 
00455             // Check E-W at south corner:   4,4 3,4 4,3
00456             if ( bLocation == LOC_3_4 || bLocation == LOC_4_4 || bLocation == LOC_4_3 )
00457             {
00458                   if ( (bLocation == LOC_3_4 && fTopLeft) || (bLocation == LOC_4_3 && fTopRight) || (bLocation == LOC_4_4) )
00459                   {
00460                         if ( !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( EAST ) ) ) &&
00461                                      !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH ) ) ) &&                                 
00462                                      !OpenLeftOrientedDoorWithDoorOnLeftOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( EAST ) ) ) && 
00463                                      !OpenRightOrientedDoorWithDoorOnRightOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH ) ) )
00464                                      )
00465                         {
00466                               return( FALSE );
00467                         }
00468                   }
00469             }
00470 
00471       }
00472 
00473 /*
00474 
00475 */
00476 
00477 
00478 
00479       // currently handled:
00480       // E-W at north corner:  (4,4), (0,4), (4,0)
00481       // N-S at east corner: (4,4)
00482       // N-S at west corner: (4,4)
00483 
00484       // could add:
00485       // N-S at east corner: (3, 4), (4, 0)
00486       // N-S at west corner: (0, 4), (4, 3)

00579                               if ( !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( EAST )) ) &&
00580                                            !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo) ) &&
00581                                            !OpenLeftOrientedDoorWithDoorOnLeftOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( EAST )) ) )
00582                               {
00583                                     fResolveHit = FALSE;
00584                               }
00585                         }
00586                         else if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT )
00587                         {
00588                               if (!WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopRightOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH )) ) &&
00589                                           !WallOrClosedDoorExistsOfTopLeftOrientation( (INT16) (iGridNo) ) &&
00590                                           !OpenRightOrientedDoorWithDoorOnRightOfEdgeExists( (INT16) (iGridNo + DirectionInc( SOUTH )) ) )
00591                               {
00592                                     fResolveHit = FALSE;
00593                               }
00594                         
00595                         }
00596                   }
00597                   // the following only at 4,4
00598                   else if ( bLOSIndexY == (PROFILE_Y_SIZE - 1) )
00599                   {
00600                         if ( pStructure->ubWallOrientation == NO_ORIENTATION)
00601                         {
00602                               // very top north corner of building, and going (screenwise) west or east
00603                               fResolveHit = FALSE;
00604                         }
00605                   }
00606             }
00607       }
00608       */
00609 
00610       return( TRUE );   
00611 }
00612 
00613 
00614 
00615 /*
00616  *
00617  * The line of sight code is now used to simulate smelling through the air (for monsters);
00618  * It obeys the following rules:
00619  * - ignores trees and vegetation
00620  * - ignores people
00621  * - should always start off with head height for both source and target, so that lying down makes no difference
00622  * - stop at closed windows
00623  * - stop for other obstacles
00624  *
00625  * Just for reference, normal sight obeys the following rules:
00626  * - trees & vegetation reduce the maximum sighting distance
00627  * - ignores people
00628  * - starts at height relative to stance
00629  * - ignores windows
00630  * - stops at other obstacles
00631  *
00632  */
00633 INT32 LineOfSightTest( FLOAT dStartX, FLOAT dStartY, FLOAT dStartZ, FLOAT dEndX, FLOAT dEndY, FLOAT dEndZ, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, UINT8 ubTreeSightReduction, INT8 bAware, INT32 bCamouflage, BOOLEAN fSmell, INT16 * psWindowGridNo )
00634 {
00635       // Parameters...
00636       // the X,Y,Z triplets should be obvious
00637       // TileSightLimit is the max # of tiles of distance visible
00638       // TreeSightReduction is the reduction in 10ths of tiles in max visibility for each LOS cube (5th of a tile) of
00639       // vegetation hit
00640       // Aware is whether the looker is aware of the target
00641       // Smell is whether this is a sight or a smell test
00642 
00643       // Now returns not a boolean but the adjusted (by cover) distance to the target, or 0 for unseen
00644 
00645       FIXEDPT           qCurrX;
00646       FIXEDPT           qCurrY;
00647       FIXEDPT           qCurrZ;
00648 
00649       INT32       iGridNo;
00650       INT32       iCurrTileX;
00651       INT32       iCurrTileY;
00652 
00653       INT8        bLOSIndexX;
00654       INT8        bLOSIndexY;
00655       INT8        bOldLOSIndexX;
00656       INT8        bOldLOSIndexY;
00657       INT32       iOldCubesZ;
00658 
00659       INT32       iCurrCubesZ;
00660 
00661       FIXEDPT     qLandHeight;
00662       INT32       iCurrAboveLevelZ;
00663       INT32       iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ;
00664       INT32       iStartCubesAboveLevelZ;
00665       INT32       iEndCubesAboveLevelZ;
00666       INT32       iStartCubesZ;
00667       INT32       iEndCubesZ;
00668       
00669       INT16       sDesiredLevel;
00670 
00671 
00672       INT32       iOldTileX;
00673       INT32       iOldTileY;
00674 
00675       FLOAT       dDeltaX;
00676       FLOAT       dDeltaY;
00677       FLOAT       dDeltaZ;
00678 
00679       FIXEDPT           qIncrX;
00680       FIXEDPT           qIncrY;
00681       FIXEDPT           qIncrZ;
00682 
00683       FLOAT       dDistance;
00684 
00685       INT32       iDistance;
00686       INT32       iSightLimit = ubTileSightLimit * CELL_X_SIZE;
00687       INT32       iAdjSightLimit = iSightLimit;
00688 
00689       INT32       iLoop;
00690 
00691       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
00692       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
00693       STRUCTURE *             pRoofStructure = NULL;
00694 
00695       BOOLEAN                             fCheckForRoof;
00696       FIXEDPT                             qLastZ;
00697 
00698       FIXEDPT                             qDistToTravelX;
00699       FIXEDPT                             qDistToTravelY;
00700       INT32                               iStepsToTravelX;
00701       INT32                               iStepsToTravelY;
00702       INT32                               iStepsToTravel;
00703       BOOLEAN                             fResolveHit;
00704       DOUBLE                              ddHorizAngle;
00705       INT32                               iStructureHeight;
00706 
00707       FIXEDPT                             qWallHeight;
00708       BOOLEAN                             fOpaque;
00709       INT8                                bSmoke = 0;
00710 
00711       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & DISALLOW_SIGHT )
00712       {
00713             return( 0 );
00714       }
00715 
00716       if (iSightLimit == 0)
00717       {
00718             // blind!
00719             return( 0 );
00720       }
00721 
00722       DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("LineOfSightTest: Thermal Optics = %d",fSmell));
00723 
00724 
00725       if (!bAware && !fSmell)
00726       {
00727             // trees are x3 as good at reducing sight if looker is unaware
00728             // and increase that up to double for camouflage!
00729             ubTreeSightReduction = (ubTreeSightReduction * 3) * (100 + bCamouflage) / 100;
00730       }
00731       // verify start and end to make sure we'll always be inside the map
00732 
00733       // hack end location to the centre of the tile, because there was a problem
00734       // seeing a presumably off-centre merc...
00735 
00736       dStartX = (FLOAT) (((INT32)dStartX) / 10) * 10 + 5;
00737       dStartY = (FLOAT) (((INT32)dStartY) / 10) * 10 + 5;
00738       
00739       dEndX = (FLOAT) (((INT32)dEndX) / 10) * 10 + 5;
00740       dEndY = (FLOAT) (((INT32)dEndY) / 10) * 10 + 5;
00741       
00742       dDeltaX = dEndX - dStartX;
00743       dDeltaY = dEndY - dStartY;
00744       dDeltaZ = dEndZ - dStartZ;
00745 
00746       dDistance = Distance3D( dDeltaX, dDeltaY, CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_DISTANCE( dDeltaZ ));
00747       iDistance = (INT32) dDistance;
00748 
00749       if ( iDistance == 0 )
00750       {
00751             return( FALSE );
00752       }
00753 
00754       if ( dDistance != (FLOAT) iDistance )
00755       {
00756             // add 1 step to account for fraction
00757             iDistance += 1;
00758       }
00759 
00760       if ( iDistance > iSightLimit)
00761       {
00762             // out of visual range
00763             return( 0 );
00764       }
00765 
00766       ddHorizAngle = atan2( dDeltaY, dDeltaX );
00767 
00768       #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
00769             memset( &gLOSTestResults, 0, sizeof( LOSResults ) );
00770             gLOSTestResults.fLOSTestPerformed = TRUE;
00771             gLOSTestResults.iStartX = (INT32) dStartX;
00772             gLOSTestResults.iStartY = (INT32) dStartY;
00773             gLOSTestResults.iStartZ = (INT32) dStartZ;
00774             gLOSTestResults.iEndX = (INT32) dEndX;
00775             gLOSTestResults.iEndY = (INT32) dEndY;
00776             gLOSTestResults.iEndZ = (INT32) dEndZ;
00777             gLOSTestResults.iMaxDistance = (INT32) iSightLimit;
00778             gLOSTestResults.iDistance = (INT32) dDistance;
00779       #endif
00780 
00781       qIncrX = FloatToFixed( dDeltaX / (FLOAT)iDistance );
00782       qIncrY = FloatToFixed( dDeltaY / (FLOAT)iDistance );
00783       qIncrZ = FloatToFixed( dDeltaZ / (FLOAT)iDistance );
00784 
00785       fCheckForRoof = FALSE;
00786 
00787       // figure out starting and ending cubes   
00788       iGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( (INT32)dStartX, (INT32)dStartY );
00789       qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dStartZ );
00790       qLandHeight = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].sHeight ) );
00791       iCurrAboveLevelZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ - qLandHeight );
00792 
00793       iStartCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
00794       iStartCubesAboveLevelZ = iStartCubesZ;
00795       if (iStartCubesAboveLevelZ >= STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX)
00796       {
00797             iStartCubesAboveLevelZ -= STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
00798       }
00799 
00800       // check to see if we need to check for roofs based on the starting gridno
00801       qWallHeight = gqStandardWallHeight + qLandHeight;
00802       if ( qCurrZ < qWallHeight )
00803       {
00804             // possibly going up through a roof on this level 
00805             qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dEndZ );
00806 
00807             if ( qCurrZ > qWallHeight )
00808             {
00809                   fCheckForRoof = TRUE;
00810             }
00811 
00812       }
00813       else // >
00814       {
00815             // possibly going down through a roof on this level
00816             qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dEndZ );
00817 
00818             if (qCurrZ < qWallHeight)
00819             {
00820                   fCheckForRoof = TRUE;
00821             }
00822       }
00823 
00824       iGridNo = GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( (INT32)dEndX, (INT32)dEndY );
00825       qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dEndZ );
00826       qLandHeight = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ].sHeight ) );
00827       iCurrAboveLevelZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ - qLandHeight );
00828       iEndCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
00829       iEndCubesAboveLevelZ = iEndCubesZ;
00830       if (iEndCubesAboveLevelZ >= STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX)
00831       {
00832             iEndCubesAboveLevelZ -= STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
00833       }
00834 
00835       // check to see if we need to check for roofs based on the starting gridno
00836       qWallHeight = gqStandardWallHeight + qLandHeight;
00837 
00838       if ( qCurrZ < qWallHeight )
00839       {
00840             // possibly going down through a roof on this level 
00841             qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dStartZ );
00842 
00843             if ( qCurrZ > qWallHeight )
00844             {
00845                   fCheckForRoof = TRUE;
00846             }
00847 
00848       }
00849       else // >
00850       {
00851             // possibly going up through a roof on this level
00852             qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dStartZ );
00853 
00854             if (qCurrZ < qWallHeight)
00855             {
00856                   fCheckForRoof = TRUE;
00857             }
00858       }
00859 
00860       // apply increments for first move
00861 
00862       // first move will be 1 step 
00863       // plus a fractional part equal to half of the difference between the delta and
00864       // the increment times the distance
00865       
00866       qCurrX = FloatToFixed( dStartX ) + qIncrX + ( FloatToFixed( dDeltaX ) - qIncrX * iDistance ) / 2;
00867       qCurrY = FloatToFixed( dStartY ) + qIncrY + ( FloatToFixed( dDeltaY ) - qIncrY * iDistance ) / 2;
00868       qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dStartZ ) + qIncrZ + ( FloatToFixed( dDeltaZ ) - qIncrZ * iDistance ) / 2;
00869 
00870       iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( qCurrX );
00871       iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( qCurrY );
00872       bLOSIndexX = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( qCurrX );
00873       bLOSIndexY = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( qCurrY );
00874       iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ ) );
00875 
00876       iLoop = 1;
00877 
00878       do
00879       {
00880             // check a particular tile
00881 
00882             // retrieve values from world for this particular tile
00883             iGridNo = iCurrTileX + iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS;
00884             pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ]);
00885             qLandHeight = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( pMapElement->sHeight ) );
00886             qWallHeight = gqStandardWallHeight + qLandHeight;
00887 
00888             if (fCheckForRoof)
00889             {
00890                   pRoofStructure = FindStructure( (INT16) iGridNo, STRUCTURE_ROOF );
00891 
00892                   if ( pRoofStructure )
00893                   {
00894 
00895                         qLastZ = qCurrZ - qIncrZ;
00896 
00897                         // if just on going to next tile we cross boundary, then roof stops sight here!
00898                         if ( (qLastZ > qWallHeight && qCurrZ <= qWallHeight) || (qLastZ < qWallHeight && qCurrZ >= qWallHeight))
00899                         {
00900                               // hit a roof
00901                               return( 0 );
00902                         }
00903 
00904                   }
00905 
00906             }
00907 
00908             // record old tile location for loop purposes
00909             iOldTileX = iCurrTileX;
00910             iOldTileY = iCurrTileY;
00911             do
00912             {
00913                   // check a particular location within the tile
00914 
00915                   // check for collision with the ground
00916                   iCurrAboveLevelZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ - qLandHeight );
00917                   if (iCurrAboveLevelZ < 0)
00918                   {
00919                         // ground is in the way!
00920                         #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
00921                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrX );
00922                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrY );
00923                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ );
00924                               // subtract one to compensate for rounding up when negative
00925                               gLOSTestResults.iCurrCubesZ = 0;
00926                         #endif
00927                         return( 0 );
00928                   }
00929                   // check for the existence of structures
00930                   pStructure = pMapElement->pStructureHead;
00931                   if (pStructure == NULL)
00932                   {     // no structures in this tile, AND THAT INCLUDES ROOFS! :-)
00933                   
00934                         // new system; figure out how many steps until we cross the next edge
00935                         // and then fast forward that many steps.
00936 
00937                         iOldTileX = iCurrTileX;
00938                         iOldTileY = iCurrTileY;
00939                         iOldCubesZ = iCurrCubesZ;
00940 
00941                         if (qIncrX > 0)
00942                         {
00943                               qDistToTravelX = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ) - (qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ));
00944                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / qIncrX;
00945                         }
00946                         else if (qIncrX < 0)
00947                         {
00948                               qDistToTravelX = qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE );
00949                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / -qIncrX;
00950                         }
00951                         else
00952                         {
00953                               // make sure we don't consider X a limit :-)
00954                               iStepsToTravelX = 1000000;
00955                         }
00956 
00957                         if (qIncrY > 0)
00958                         {
00959                               qDistToTravelY = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ) - (qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ));                    
00960                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / qIncrY;
00961                         }
00962                         else if (qIncrY < 0)
00963                         {
00964                               qDistToTravelY = qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE );
00965                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / -qIncrY;
00966                         }
00967                         else
00968                         {
00969                               // make sure we don't consider Y a limit :-)
00970                               iStepsToTravelY = 1000000;
00971                         }
00972 
00973                         iStepsToTravel = __min( iStepsToTravelX, iStepsToTravelY ) + 1;
00974 
00975 /*
00976                         if (qIncrX > 0)
00977                         {
00978                               qDistToTravelX = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ) - (qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ));
00979                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / qIncrX;
00980                         }
00981                         else if (qIncrX < 0)
00982                         {
00983                               qDistToTravelX = qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE );
00984                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / (-qIncrX);
00985                         }
00986                         else
00987                         {
00988                               // make sure we don't consider X a limit :-)
00989                               iStepsToTravelX = 1000000;
00990                         }
00991 
00992                         if (qIncrY > 0)
00993                         {
00994                               qDistToTravelY = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ) - (qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ));                    
00995                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / qIncrY;
00996                         }
00997                         else if (qIncrY < 0)
00998                         {
00999                               qDistToTravelY = qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE );
01000                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / (-qIncrY);
01001                         }
01002                         else
01003                         {
01004                               // make sure we don't consider Y a limit :-)
01005                               iStepsToTravelY = 1000000;
01006                         }
01007 
01008                         // add 1 to the # of steps to travel to go INTO the next tile
01009                         iStepsToTravel = __min( iStepsToTravelX, iStepsToTravelY ) + 1;
01010                         //iStepsToTravel = 1;
01011                         */
01012 
01013                         qCurrX += qIncrX * iStepsToTravel;
01014                         qCurrY += qIncrY * iStepsToTravel;
01015                         qCurrZ += qIncrZ * iStepsToTravel;
01016                         iLoop += iStepsToTravel;
01017 
01018                         // check for ground collision
01019                         if (qCurrZ < qLandHeight && iLoop < iDistance)
01020                         {
01021                               // ground is in the way!
01022                               #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01023                                     gLOSTestResults.iStoppedX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrX );
01024                                     gLOSTestResults.iStoppedY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrY );
01025                                     gLOSTestResults.iStoppedZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ );
01026                                     // subtract one to compensate for rounding up when negative
01027                                     gLOSTestResults.iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ ) - 1;
01028                               #endif
01029                               return( 0 );
01030                         }
01031 
01032                         // figure out the new tile location
01033                         iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( qCurrX );
01034                         iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( qCurrY );
01035                         iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ ) );
01036                         bLOSIndexX = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( qCurrX );
01037                         bLOSIndexY = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( qCurrY );
01038                   }
01039                   else
01040                   {     // there are structures in this tile
01041 
01042                         iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
01043                         // figure out the LOS cube level of the current point
01044 
01045                         if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF_MAX)
01046                         {
01047                               if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX) 
01048                               {
01049                                     // check objects on the ground
01050                                     sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
01051                               }
01052                               else
01053                               {
01054                                     // check objects on roofs
01055                                     sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
01056                                     iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ -= STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
01057                               }
01058                               // check structures for collision
01059                               while (pStructure != NULL)
01060                               {
01061                                     // transparent structures should be skipped
01062                                     // normal roof structures should be skipped here because their only bits are roof lips
01063                                     // and those should act as transparent
01064                                     fOpaque = (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_TRANSPARENT) == 0;
01065                                     if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ROOF )
01066                                     {
01067                                           // roof lip; allow sighting if person on roof is near
01068                                           if ( (iLoop < 2 * CELL_X_SIZE || (iDistance - iLoop) < 2 * CELL_X_SIZE ) )
01069                                           {
01070                                                 if ( iLoop <= CELL_X_SIZE + 1 || (iDistance - iLoop ) <= CELL_X_SIZE + 1 )
01071                                                 {
01072                                                       // right near edge, allow sighting at 3 tiles from roof edge if prone
01073                                                       // less if standing, and we can tell that with iStartCubesZ and iEndCubesZ
01074                                                       if ( iStartCubesZ < iEndCubesZ )
01075                                                       {
01076                                                             // looking up, so reduce for the target stance-height according to iEndCubesZ
01077                                                             if ( iDistance >= (3 - iEndCubesAboveLevelZ) * CELL_X_SIZE )
01078                                                             {
01079                                                                   fOpaque = FALSE;  
01080                                                             }
01081                                                       }
01082                                                       else
01083                                                       {
01084                                                             if ( iDistance >= (3 - iStartCubesAboveLevelZ) * CELL_X_SIZE )
01085                                                             {
01086                                                                   fOpaque = FALSE;  
01087                                                             }
01088                                                       }
01089 
01090                                                 }
01091                                                 else
01092                                                 {
01093                                                       if ( iDistance >= 12 * CELL_X_SIZE )
01094                                                       {
01095                                                             fOpaque = FALSE;
01096                                                       }
01097                                                 }
01098                                           }
01099                                     }
01100 
01101                                     if ( fOpaque )
01102                                     {
01103                                           if (pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel)
01104                                           {
01105                                                 if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bLOSIndexX][bLOSIndexY] & AtHeight[iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ]) > 0)
01106                                                 {
01107                                                       if (fSmell)
01108                                                       {
01109                                                             if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_TREE)
01110                                                             {
01111                                                                   // smell not stopped by vegetation
01112                                                             }
01113                                                             else if ((pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW))// && (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_OPEN))
01114                                                             {
01115                                                                   // open/closed window, smell not stopped                                                        
01116                                                             }
01117                                                             else
01118                                                             {
01119                                                                   if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF)
01120                                                                   {
01121                                                                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("LineOfSightTest: checking thru wall, thermal = %d",fSmell));
01122                                                                         // possibly at corner in which case we should let it pass
01123                                                                         fResolveHit = ResolveHitOnWall( pStructure, iGridNo, bLOSIndexX, bLOSIndexY, ddHorizAngle );
01124                                                                   }
01125                                                                   else
01126                                                                   {
01127                                                                         fResolveHit = TRUE;
01128                                                                   }     
01129                                                                   if (fResolveHit)
01130                                                                   {
01131                                                                         // CJC, May 30:  smell reduced by obstacles but not stopped
01132                                                                         // if obstacle within 10 tiles
01133                                                                         iAdjSightLimit -= SMELL_REDUCTION_FOR_NEARBY_OBSTACLE;
01134                                                                         DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("LineOfSightTest: hit a wall, thermal = %d, sight limit = %d, distance = %d",fSmell,iAdjSightLimit,iDistance));
01135                                                                         if (iLoop > 100 || iDistance > iAdjSightLimit)
01136                                                                         {
01137                                                                               DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("LineOfSightTest: couldn't see thru wall, thermal = %d",fSmell));
01138                                                                               // out of visual range
01139                                                                               #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01140                                                                                     gLOSTestResults.fOutOfRange = TRUE;
01141                                                                                     gLOSTestResults.iCurrCubesZ = iCurrCubesZ;
01142                                                                               #endif
01143                                                                               return( 0 );
01144                                                                         }
01145                                                                   
01146                                                                         /*
01147                                                                         // smell-line stopped by obstacle!
01148                                                                         #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01149                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrX );
01150                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrY );
01151                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ );
01152                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iCurrCubesZ = iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ;
01153                                                                         #endif
01154                                                                         return( 0 );
01155                                                                         */
01156                                                                   }
01157                                                             }
01158                                                       }
01159                                                       else
01160                                                       {
01161                                                             if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_TREE)
01162                                                             {
01163                                                                   // don't count trees close to the person
01164                                                                   if (iLoop > CLOSE_TO_FIRER)
01165                                                                   {                                                                        
01166                                                                         if (iLoop > 100)
01167                                                                         {
01168                                                                               // at longer range increase the value of tree cover
01169                                                                               iAdjSightLimit -= (ubTreeSightReduction * iLoop) / 100;
01170                                                                         }
01171                                                                         else
01172                                                                         {
01173                                                                               // use standard value
01174                                                                               iAdjSightLimit -= ubTreeSightReduction;
01175                                                                         }
01176                                                                         #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01177                                                                               gLOSTestResults.ubTreeSpotsHit++;
01178                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iMaxDistance = iSightLimit;
01179                                                                         #endif
01180                                                                         if (iDistance > iAdjSightLimit)
01181                                                                         {
01182                                                                               // out of visual range
01183                                                                               #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01184                                                                                     gLOSTestResults.fOutOfRange = TRUE;
01185                                                                                     gLOSTestResults.iCurrCubesZ = iCurrCubesZ;
01186                                                                               #endif
01187                                                                               return( 0 );
01188                                                                         }
01189                                                                   }
01190                                                             }
01191                                                             else if ( (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW) && !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_SPECIAL) && qCurrZ >= (gqStandardWindowBottomHeight + qLandHeight) && qCurrZ <= (gqStandardWindowTopHeight + qLandHeight))
01192                                                             {
01193                                                                   // do nothing; windows are transparent (except ones marked as special)
01194                                                                   if (psWindowGridNo != NULL)
01195                                                                   {
01196                                                                         // we're supposed to note the location of this window!
01197                                                                         // but if a location has already been set then there are two windows, in which case
01198                                                                         // we abort
01199                                                                         if (*psWindowGridNo == NOWHERE)
01200                                                                         {
01201                                                                               *psWindowGridNo = (INT16) iGridNo;
01202                                                                               return( iLoop );
01203                                                                         }
01204                                                                         else
01205                                                                         {
01206                                                                               //*psWindowGridNo = NOWHERE;
01207                                                                               //return( iLoop );
01208                                                                         }
01209                                                                   }
01210                                                             }
01211                                                             else
01212                                                             {
01213                                                                   if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF)
01214                                                                   {
01215                                                                         // possibly shooting at corner in which case we should let it pass
01216                                                                         fResolveHit = ResolveHitOnWall( pStructure, iGridNo, bLOSIndexX, bLOSIndexY, ddHorizAngle );
01217                                                                   }
01218                                                                   else
01219                                                                   {
01220                                                                         if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < (STANDING_CUBES - 1) )
01221                                                                         {
01222                                                                               if ( (iLoop <= CLOSE_TO_FIRER) && (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= iStartCubesAboveLevelZ) )
01223                                                                               {
01224                                                                                     // if we are in the same vertical cube as the start,
01225                                                                                     // and this is the height of the structure, then allow sight to go through
01226                                                                                     // NB cubes are 0 based, heights 1 based
01227                                                                                     iStructureHeight = StructureHeight( pStructure );
01228                                                                                     fResolveHit = ( iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ != (iStructureHeight - 1) );
01229                                                                               }
01230                                                                               else if ( (iLoop >= (iDistance - CLOSE_TO_FIRER) ) && (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= iEndCubesZ) && bAware )
01231                                                                               {
01232                                                                                     // if we are in the same vertical cube as our destination,
01233                                                                                     // and this is the height of the structure, and we are aware
01234                                                                                     // then allow sight to go through
01235                                                                                     // NB cubes are 0 based, heights 1 based
01236                                                                                     iStructureHeight = StructureHeight( pStructure );
01237                                                                                     fResolveHit = ( iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ != (iStructureHeight - 1) );
01238                                                                               }
01239                                                                               else
01240                                                                               {
01241                                                                                     fResolveHit = TRUE;
01242                                                                               }
01243                                                                         }
01244                                                                         else
01245                                                                         {
01246                                                                               fResolveHit = TRUE;
01247                                                                         }
01248                                                                   }     
01249                                                                   if (fResolveHit)
01250                                                                   {
01251                                                                         // hit the obstacle!
01252                                                                         #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01253                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrX );
01254                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrY );
01255                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iStoppedZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ );
01256                                                                               gLOSTestResults.iCurrCubesZ = iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ;
01257                                                                         #endif
01258                                                                         return( 0 );
01259                                                                   }
01260                                                             }
01261                                                       }
01262                                                 }
01263                                           }
01264                                     }
01265                                     pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
01266                               }     
01267                         }
01268                         // got past all structures; go to next location within
01269                         // tile, horizontally or vertically
01270                         bOldLOSIndexX = bLOSIndexX;
01271                         bOldLOSIndexY = bLOSIndexY;
01272                         iOldCubesZ = iCurrCubesZ;
01273                         do
01274                         {
01275                               qCurrX += qIncrX;
01276                               qCurrY += qIncrY;
01277                               if (pRoofStructure)
01278                               {
01279                                     qLastZ = qCurrZ;
01280                                     qCurrZ += qIncrZ;
01281                                     if ( (qLastZ > qWallHeight && qCurrZ <= qWallHeight) || (qLastZ < qWallHeight && qCurrZ >= qWallHeight))
01282                                     {
01283                                           // hit a roof
01284                                           return( 0 );
01285                                     }
01286                               }
01287                               else
01288                               {
01289                                     qCurrZ += qIncrZ;
01290                               }
01291 
01292                               iLoop++;                            
01293                               bLOSIndexX = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( qCurrX );
01294                               bLOSIndexY = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( qCurrY );
01295                               iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ ) );
01296                               // shouldn't need to check whether we are not at maximum range because
01297                               // that will be caught below and this loop shouldn't go for more than a 
01298                               // couple of iterations.
01299                         }
01300                         while( (bLOSIndexX == bOldLOSIndexX) && (bLOSIndexY == bOldLOSIndexY) && (iCurrCubesZ == iOldCubesZ));
01301                         iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( qCurrX );
01302                         iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( qCurrY );
01303                   }
01304             } while( (iCurrTileX == iOldTileX) && (iCurrTileY == iOldTileY) && (iLoop < iDistance));
01305 
01306             // leaving a tile, check to see if it had gas in it
01307 //          if ( pMapElement->ubExtFlags[0] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE | MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS) )
01308             if ( pMapElement->ubExtFlags[0] & (MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE | MAPELEMENT_EXT_TEARGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_MUSTARDGAS | MAPELEMENT_EXT_BURNABLEGAS) )
01309             {
01310                   if ( (pMapElement->ubExtFlags[0] & MAPELEMENT_EXT_SMOKE) && !fSmell )
01311                   {
01312                         bSmoke++;
01313 
01314                         // we can only see 3 tiles in smoke
01315                         // (2 if we're IN smoke)
01316 
01317                         if ( bSmoke >= 3 )
01318                         {
01319                               iAdjSightLimit = 0;
01320                         }
01321                         // unpopular
01322                         /*
01323                         else
01324                         {
01325                               // losing 1/3rd results in chances to hit which are WAY too low when firing from out of
01326                               // two tiles of smoke... changing this to a 1/6 penalty
01327                               
01328                               iAdjSightLimit -= iSightLimit / 6;
01329                         }
01330                         */
01331                   }
01332                   else
01333                   {
01334                         // reduce by 2 tiles per tile of tear gas or mustard gas
01335                         iAdjSightLimit -= 2 * CELL_X_SIZE;
01336                   }
01337 
01338                   if ( iAdjSightLimit <= 0 )
01339                   {
01340                         // can't see, period!
01341                         return( 0 );
01342                   }
01343             }
01344 
01345       } while( iLoop < iDistance );
01346       // unless the distance is integral, after the loop there will be a
01347       // fractional amount of distance remaining which is unchecked
01348       // but we shouldn't(?) need to check it because the target is there!
01349       #ifdef LOS_DEBUG
01350             gLOSTestResults.fLOSClear = TRUE;
01351       #endif
01352       // this somewhat complicated formula does the following:
01353       // it starts with the distance to the target
01354       // it adds the difference between the original and adjusted sight limit, = the amount of cover
01355       // it then scales the value based on the difference between the original sight limit and the 
01356       //   very maximum possible in best lighting conditions
01357       return( (iDistance + (iSightLimit - iAdjSightLimit)) * (MaxDistanceVisible() * CELL_X_SIZE) / iSightLimit );
01358 }
01359 
01360 BOOLEAN CalculateSoldierZPos( SOLDIERTYPE * pSoldier, UINT8 ubPosType, FLOAT * pdZPos )
01361 {
01362       UINT8       ubHeight;
01363 
01364       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == CROW )
01365       {
01366             // Crow always as prone...
01367             ubHeight = ANIM_PRONE;
01368       }
01369       else if (pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER)
01370       {
01371             // treat as prone
01372             ubHeight = ANIM_PRONE;
01373       }
01374       else if ( pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == LOW_WATER || pSoldier->bOverTerrainType == MED_WATER )
01375       {
01376             // treat as crouched
01377             ubHeight = ANIM_CROUCH;
01378       }
01379       else
01380       {
01381             if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pSoldier ) || pSoldier->ubBodyType == COW )
01382             {
01383                   // this if statement is to avoid the 'creature weak spot' target 
01384                   // spot for creatures
01385                   if ( ubPosType == HEAD_TARGET_POS || ubPosType == LEGS_TARGET_POS )
01386                   {
01387                         // override!
01388                         ubPosType = TORSO_TARGET_POS;
01389                   }
01390             }
01391             else if ( TANK( pSoldier ) )
01392             {
01393                   // high up!
01394                   ubPosType = HEAD_TARGET_POS;
01395             }
01396 
01397             ubHeight = gAnimControl[ pSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight;
01398       }
01399       
01400       switch( ubPosType )
01401       {
01402             case LOS_POS:
01403                   switch ( ubHeight )
01404                   {
01405                         case ANIM_STAND:
01406                               *pdZPos = STANDING_LOS_POS;
01407                               break;
01408                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01409                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_LOS_POS;
01410                               break;
01411                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01412                               *pdZPos = PRONE_LOS_POS;
01413                               break;
01414                         default:
01415                               return( FALSE );
01416                   }
01417                   break;
01418             case FIRING_POS:
01419                   switch ( ubHeight )
01420                   {
01421                         case ANIM_STAND:
01422                               *pdZPos = STANDING_FIRING_POS;
01423                               break;
01424                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01425                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_FIRING_POS;
01426                               break;
01427                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01428                               *pdZPos = PRONE_FIRING_POS;
01429                               break;
01430                         default:
01431                               return( FALSE );
01432                   }
01433                   break;
01434             case TARGET_POS:
01435                   switch ( ubHeight )
01436                   {
01437                         case ANIM_STAND:
01438                               *pdZPos = STANDING_TARGET_POS;
01439                               break;
01440                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01441                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_TARGET_POS;
01442                               break;
01443                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01444                               *pdZPos = PRONE_TARGET_POS;
01445                               break;
01446                         default:
01447                               return( FALSE );
01448                   }
01449                   break;
01450             case HEAD_TARGET_POS:
01451                   switch ( ubHeight )
01452                   {
01453                         case ANIM_STAND:
01454                               *pdZPos = STANDING_HEAD_TARGET_POS;
01455                               break;
01456                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01457                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_HEAD_TARGET_POS;
01458                               break;
01459                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01460                               *pdZPos = PRONE_HEAD_TARGET_POS;
01461                               break;
01462                         default:
01463                               return( FALSE );
01464                   }
01465                   break;
01466             case TORSO_TARGET_POS:
01467                   switch ( ubHeight )
01468                   {
01469                         case ANIM_STAND:
01470                               *pdZPos = STANDING_TORSO_TARGET_POS;
01471                               break;
01472                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01473                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_TORSO_TARGET_POS;
01474                               break;
01475                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01476                               *pdZPos = PRONE_TORSO_TARGET_POS;
01477                               break;
01478                         default:
01479                               return( FALSE );
01480                   }
01481                   break;
01482             case LEGS_TARGET_POS:
01483                   switch ( ubHeight )
01484                   {
01485                         case ANIM_STAND:
01486                               *pdZPos = STANDING_LEGS_TARGET_POS;
01487                               break;
01488                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01489                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_LEGS_TARGET_POS;
01490                               break;
01491                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01492                               *pdZPos = PRONE_LEGS_TARGET_POS;
01493                               break;
01494                         default:
01495                               return( FALSE );
01496                   }
01497                   break;
01498             case HEIGHT:
01499                   switch ( ubHeight )
01500                   {
01501                         case ANIM_STAND:
01502                               *pdZPos = STANDING_HEIGHT;
01503                               break;
01504                         case ANIM_CROUCH:
01505                               *pdZPos = CROUCHED_HEIGHT;
01506                               break;
01507                         case ANIM_PRONE:
01508                               *pdZPos = PRONE_HEIGHT;
01509                               break;
01510                         default:
01511                               return( FALSE );
01512                   }
01513                   break;
01514       }
01515       if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == HATKIDCIV || pSoldier->ubBodyType == KIDCIV )
01516       {
01517             // reduce value for kids who are 2/3 the height of regular people
01518             *pdZPos = (*pdZPos * 2) / 3;
01519       }
01520       else if ( pSoldier->ubBodyType == ROBOTNOWEAPON || pSoldier->ubBodyType == LARVAE_MONSTER || pSoldier->ubBodyType == INFANT_MONSTER || pSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01521       {
01522             // robot is 1/3 the height of regular people
01523             *pdZPos = *pdZPos / 3;
01524       }
01525       else if ( TANK ( pSoldier ) )
01526       {
01527             *pdZPos = (*pdZPos * 4) / 3;
01528       }
01529 
01530       if (pSoldier->bLevel > 0)
01531       { // on a roof
01532             *pdZPos += WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS;
01533       }
01534 
01535       // IF this is a plane, strafe!
01536       // ATE: Don;t panic - this is temp - to be changed to a status flag....
01537       if ( pSoldier->ubID == MAX_NUM_SOLDIERS )
01538       {
01539             *pdZPos = ( WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS * 2 ) - 1;
01540       }
01541 
01542       *pdZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[pSoldier->sGridNo].sHeight );
01543       return( TRUE );
01544 }
01545 
01546 INT32 SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01547 {
01548       FLOAT             dStartZPos, dEndZPos;
01549       BOOLEAN           fOk;
01550       BOOLEAN           fSmell;
01551       INT16             bEffectiveCamo;
01552       INT16             bEffectiveStealth;
01553       UINT8             ubTreeReduction;
01554       INT32 iTemp;
01555 
01556       // TO ADD: if target is camouflaged and in cover, reduce sight distance by 30%
01557       // TO ADD: if in tear gas, reduce sight limit to 2 tiles
01558       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
01559       CHECKF( pEndSoldier );
01560       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pStartSoldier, LOS_POS, &dStartZPos );
01561       CHECKF( fOk );
01562 
01563       if ( gWorldSectorX == 5 && gWorldSectorY == MAP_ROW_N )
01564       {
01565             // in the bloodcat arena sector, skip sight between army & bloodcats
01566             if ( pStartSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM && pEndSoldier->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM )
01567             {
01568                   return( 0 );
01569             }
01570             if ( pStartSoldier->bTeam == CREATURE_TEAM && pEndSoldier->bTeam == ENEMY_TEAM )
01571             {
01572                   return( 0 );
01573             }
01574       }
01575 
01576 
01577       if (pStartSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER)
01578       {
01579             // monsters use smell instead of sight!
01580             dEndZPos = STANDING_LOS_POS; // should avoid low rocks etc
01581             if (pEndSoldier->bLevel > 0)
01582             { // on a roof
01583                   dEndZPos += WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS;
01584             }
01585             dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[pEndSoldier->sGridNo].sHeight );
01586             fSmell = TRUE;
01587       }
01588       else
01589       {
01590             fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pEndSoldier, LOS_POS, &dEndZPos );
01591             CHECKF( fOk );
01592             fSmell = HasThermalOptics( pStartSoldier);
01593       }
01594 
01595       if ( TANK( pStartSoldier ) )
01596       {
01597             INT16       sDistance;
01598 
01599             sDistance = PythSpacesAway( pStartSoldier->sGridNo, pEndSoldier->sGridNo );
01600             
01601             if ( sDistance <= 8 )
01602             {
01603                   // blind spot?
01604                   if ( dEndZPos <= PRONE_LOS_POS )
01605                   {
01606                         return( FALSE );
01607                   }
01608                   else if ( sDistance <= 4 && dEndZPos <= CROUCHED_LOS_POS )
01609                   {
01610                         return( FALSE );
01611                   }
01612             }
01613       }
01614 
01615       //get the total camouflage
01616       int jungle = max(1,min(100,pEndSoldier->bCamo + pEndSoldier->wornCamo));
01617       int urban = max(1,min(100,pEndSoldier->urbanCamo + pEndSoldier->wornUrbanCamo));
01618       int desert = max(1,min(100,pEndSoldier->desertCamo + pEndSoldier->wornDesertCamo));
01619       int snow = max(1,min(100,pEndSoldier->snowCamo + pEndSoldier->wornSnowCamo));
01620       int totalCamo = max(1,min(100,jungle + urban + desert + snow));
01621 
01622       if ( ( totalCamo ) > 0 && !bAware )
01623       {
01624 
01625             // reduce effects of camo of 5% per tile moved last turn
01626             if ( pEndSoldier->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT )
01627             {
01628                   bEffectiveCamo = 100 - pEndSoldier->bTilesMoved * 5;
01629             }
01630             else
01631             {
01632                   bEffectiveCamo = max(0,min(100,(totalCamo))) * (100 - pEndSoldier->bTilesMoved * 5) / 100;
01633             }
01634             bEffectiveCamo = __max( bEffectiveCamo, 0 );
01635 
01636             if ( gAnimControl[ pEndSoldier->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight < ANIM_STAND )
01637             {
01638                   iTemp = ubTileSightLimit;
01639                   // reduce visibility by up to a third for camouflage!
01640                   switch( pEndSoldier->bOverTerrainType )
01641                   {
01642                         case LOW_GRASS:
01643                         case HIGH_GRASS:  // jungle camo bonus
01644                               iTemp -= iTemp * (jungle * bEffectiveCamo / 3 / totalCamo) / 100;
01645                               break;
01646                         case FLAT_FLOOR: // flat floor = indoors
01647                         case PAVED_ROAD: // urban camo bonus
01648                               iTemp -= iTemp * (urban * bEffectiveCamo / 3 / totalCamo) / 100;
01649                               break;
01650                         case DIRT_ROAD:  // desert camo bonus
01651                         case TRAIN_TRACKS:
01652                               iTemp -= iTemp * (desert * bEffectiveCamo / 3 / totalCamo) / 100;
01653                               break;
01654                         //case ??? :  // snow camo bonus
01655                         //    iTemp -= iTemp * (snow * bEffectiveCamo / 3 / totalCamo) / 100;
01656                         //    break;
01657                         case FLAT_GROUND:  
01658                               //in this case both desert and jungle can work:
01659                               iTemp -= iTemp * (jungle * bEffectiveCamo / 3 / totalCamo) / 100;
01660                               iTemp -= iTemp * (desert * bEffectiveCamo / 3 / totalCamo) / 100;
01661                               break;
01662                         default:
01663                               break;
01664                   }
01665                   ubTileSightLimit = (UINT8) iTemp;
01666             }
01667       }
01668       else
01669       {
01670             bEffectiveCamo = 0;
01671       }
01672 
01673       //Madd: added - note stealth is capped at 100 just like camo
01674       if ( ( GetWornStealth(pEndSoldier) ) > 0 && !bAware )
01675       {
01676 
01677             // reduce effects of stealth by 5% per tile moved last turn
01678             bEffectiveStealth = max(0,min(100,(GetWornStealth(pEndSoldier)))) * (100 - pEndSoldier->bTilesMoved * 5) / 100;
01679 
01680             bEffectiveStealth = __max( bEffectiveStealth, 0 );
01681 
01682             // reduce visibility by up to a third for Stealth!
01683             // stance and terrain don't matter
01684             iTemp = ubTileSightLimit;
01685             iTemp -= iTemp * (bEffectiveStealth / 3) / 100;
01686             ubTileSightLimit = (UINT8) iTemp;
01687       }
01688       else
01689       {
01690             bEffectiveStealth = 0;
01691       }
01692 
01693       if ( TANK( pEndSoldier ) )
01694       {
01695             ubTreeReduction = 0;
01696       }
01697       else
01698       {
01699             ubTreeReduction = gubTreeSightReduction[ gAnimControl[pEndSoldier->usAnimState].ubEndHeight ];
01700       }
01701 
01702       return( LineOfSightTest( (FLOAT) CenterX( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), dStartZPos, (FLOAT) CenterX( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), dEndZPos, ubTileSightLimit, ubTreeReduction, bAware, bEffectiveCamo + bEffectiveStealth, fSmell, NULL ) );
01703 }
01704 
01705 INT16 SoldierToLocationWindowTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sEndGridNo )
01706 {
01707       // figure out if there is a SINGLE window between the looker and target
01708       FLOAT             dStartZPos, dEndZPos;
01709       INT16             sXPos, sYPos, sWindowGridNo = NOWHERE;
01710       INT32             iRet;
01711 
01712       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
01713       dStartZPos = FixedToFloat( ((gqStandardWindowTopHeight + gqStandardWindowBottomHeight) / 2) );
01714       if (pStartSoldier->bLevel > 0)
01715       { // on a roof
01716             dStartZPos += WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS;
01717       }
01718       dStartZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[pStartSoldier->sGridNo].sHeight );
01719       dEndZPos = dStartZPos;
01720 
01721       ConvertGridNoToXY( sEndGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01722       sXPos = sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
01723       sYPos = sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
01724 
01725       // We don't want to consider distance limits here so pass in tile sight limit of 255
01726       // and consider trees as little as possible
01727       iRet = LineOfSightTest( (FLOAT) CenterX( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), dStartZPos, (FLOAT) sXPos, (FLOAT) sYPos, dEndZPos, 255, 0, TRUE, 0, FALSE, &sWindowGridNo ); 
01728 
01729       return( sWindowGridNo );
01730 }
01731 
01732 BOOLEAN SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTimingTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01733 {
01734       UINT32            uiLoopLimit = 100000;
01735       UINT32            uiLoop;
01736       UINT32            uiStartTime, uiEndTime;
01737 
01738   FILE      *OutFile;
01739       
01740       uiStartTime = GetJA2Clock();
01741       for (uiLoop = 0; uiLoop < uiLoopLimit; uiLoop++)
01742       {
01743             SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest( pStartSoldier, pEndSoldier, ubTileSightLimit, bAware );
01744       }
01745       uiEndTime = GetJA2Clock();
01746       if ((OutFile = fopen("Timing.txt", "a+t")) != NULL)
01747       { 
01748       #ifdef _DEBUG
01749             fprintf(OutFile, "DEBUG: " );
01750       #endif
01751         fprintf(OutFile, (const char *)String( "Time for %d calls is %d milliseconds\n", uiLoopLimit, uiEndTime - uiStartTime));
01752             fclose(OutFile);
01753       }
01754       return( TRUE );
01755 }
01756 
01757 INT32 SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, INT8 bCubeLevel, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01758 {
01759       FLOAT                               dStartZPos, dEndZPos;
01760       INT16                               sXPos, sYPos;
01761       UINT8                               ubTargetID;
01762       SOLDIERTYPE *           pTarget;
01763       BOOLEAN                             fOk;
01764 
01765       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
01766 
01767       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pStartSoldier, LOS_POS, &dStartZPos );
01768       CHECKF( fOk );
01769 
01770       if (bCubeLevel > 0)
01771       {
01772             dEndZPos = ((FLOAT) (bCubeLevel + bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE ) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
01773             dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight );
01774       }
01775       else
01776       {
01777             ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel );
01778             if (ubTargetID != NOBODY)
01779             {
01780                   pTarget = MercPtrs[ubTargetID];
01781                   // there's a merc there; do a soldier-to-soldier test
01782                   return( SoldierToSoldierLineOfSightTest( pStartSoldier, pTarget, ubTileSightLimit, bAware) );
01783             }
01784             // else... assume standing height
01785             dEndZPos = STANDING_LOS_POS + bLevel * HEIGHT_UNITS;
01786             // add in ground height
01787             dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ sGridNo ].sHeight );
01788       }
01789 
01790       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01791       sXPos = sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
01792       sYPos = sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
01793 
01794       return( LineOfSightTest( (FLOAT) CenterX( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), dStartZPos, (FLOAT) sXPos, (FLOAT) sYPos, dEndZPos, ubTileSightLimit, gubTreeSightReduction[ANIM_STAND], bAware, 0, HasThermalOptics( pStartSoldier), NULL ) );
01795 }
01796 
01797 INT32 SoldierToBodyPartLineOfSightTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, UINT8 ubAimLocation, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01798 {
