01799       SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier;
01800       UINT8 ubTargetID;
01801       FLOAT             dStartZPos, dEndZPos;
01802       INT16             sXPos, sYPos;
01803       BOOLEAN           fOk;
01804       UINT8             ubPosType;
01805 
01806       // CJC August 13, 2002: for this routine to work there MUST be a target at the location specified
01807       ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( sGridNo, bLevel );
01808       if (ubTargetID == NOBODY)
01809       {
01810             return( 0 );
01811       }
01812       pEndSoldier = MercPtrs[ubTargetID];
01813 
01814       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
01815 
01816       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pStartSoldier, LOS_POS, &dStartZPos );
01817       CHECKF( fOk );
01818 
01819       switch( ubAimLocation ) 
01820       {
01821             case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
01822                   ubPosType = HEAD_TARGET_POS;
01823                   break;
01824             case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
01825                   ubPosType = TORSO_TARGET_POS;
01826                   break;
01827             case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
01828                   ubPosType = LEGS_TARGET_POS;
01829                   break;
01830             default:
01831                   ubPosType = TARGET_POS;
01832                   break;
01833       }
01834 
01835       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pEndSoldier, ubPosType, &dEndZPos );
01836       if (!fOk)
01837       {
01838             return( FALSE );
01839       }
01840 
01841       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01842       sXPos = sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
01843       sYPos = sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
01844 
01845       return( LineOfSightTest( (FLOAT) CenterX( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), dStartZPos, (FLOAT) sXPos, (FLOAT) sYPos, dEndZPos, ubTileSightLimit, gubTreeSightReduction[ANIM_STAND], bAware, 0, HasThermalOptics( pStartSoldier), NULL ) );
01846 }
01847 
01848 INT32 SoldierToVirtualSoldierLineOfSightTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, INT8 bStance, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01849 {
01850       FLOAT                               dStartZPos, dEndZPos;
01851       INT16                               sXPos, sYPos;
01852       BOOLEAN                             fOk;
01853 
01854       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
01855 
01856       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pStartSoldier, LOS_POS, &dStartZPos );
01857       CHECKF( fOk );
01858 
01859       // manually calculate destination Z position.
01860       switch( bStance )
01861       {
01862             case ANIM_STAND:
01863                   dEndZPos = STANDING_LOS_POS;
01864                   break;
01865             case ANIM_CROUCH:
01866                   dEndZPos = CROUCHED_LOS_POS;
01867                   break;
01868             case ANIM_PRONE:
01869                   dEndZPos = PRONE_LOS_POS;
01870                   break;
01871             default:
01872                   return( FALSE );
01873       }
01874       dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].sHeight );
01875       if (bLevel > 0)
01876       { // on a roof
01877             dEndZPos += WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS;
01878       }
01879 
01880 
01881       ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
01882       sXPos = sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
01883       sYPos = sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
01884 
01885       return( LineOfSightTest( (FLOAT) CenterX( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pStartSoldier->sGridNo ), dStartZPos, (FLOAT) sXPos, (FLOAT) sYPos, dEndZPos, ubTileSightLimit, gubTreeSightReduction[ANIM_STAND], bAware, 0, HasThermalOptics( pStartSoldier), NULL ) );
01886 }
01887 
01888 INT32 SoldierToLocationLineOfSightTest( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01889 {
01890       return( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( pStartSoldier, sGridNo, 0, 0, ubTileSightLimit, bAware ) );
01891 }
01892 
01893 INT32 LocationToLocationLineOfSightTest( INT16 sStartGridNo, INT8 bStartLevel, INT16 sEndGridNo, INT8 bEndLevel, UINT8 ubTileSightLimit, INT8 bAware )
01894 {
01895       FLOAT                               dStartZPos, dEndZPos;
01896       INT16                               sStartXPos, sStartYPos, sEndXPos, sEndYPos;
01897       UINT8                               ubStartID;
01898       
01899       ubStartID = WhoIsThere2( sStartGridNo, bStartLevel );
01900       if ( ubStartID != NOBODY )
01901       {
01902             return( SoldierTo3DLocationLineOfSightTest( MercPtrs[ ubStartID ], sEndGridNo, bEndLevel, 0, ubTileSightLimit, bAware ) );
01903       }
01904 
01905       // else... assume standing heights
01906       dStartZPos = STANDING_LOS_POS + bStartLevel * HEIGHT_UNITS;
01907       // add in ground height
01908       dStartZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ sStartGridNo ].sHeight );
01909 
01910       ConvertGridNoToXY( sStartGridNo, &sStartXPos, &sStartYPos );
01911       sStartXPos = sStartXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
01912       sStartYPos = sStartYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
01913 
01914       dEndZPos = STANDING_LOS_POS + bEndLevel * HEIGHT_UNITS;
01915       // add in ground height
01916       dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ sEndGridNo ].sHeight );
01917 
01918       ConvertGridNoToXY( sEndGridNo, &sEndXPos, &sEndYPos );
01919       sEndXPos = sEndXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
01920       sEndYPos = sEndYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
01921 
01922       return( LineOfSightTest( (FLOAT)sStartXPos, (FLOAT)sStartYPos, dStartZPos, (FLOAT) sEndXPos, (FLOAT) sEndYPos, dEndZPos, ubTileSightLimit, gubTreeSightReduction[ANIM_STAND], bAware, 0, FALSE, NULL ) );
01923 }
01924 
01925 /*
01926 INT32 BulletImpactReducedByRange( INT32 iImpact, INT32 iDistanceTravelled, INT32 iRange )
01927 {
01928       // for now, don't reduce, because did weird stuff to AI!
01929       return( iImpact );
01930 
01931       // only start reducing impact at distances greater than one range
01932       //return( __max( 1, iImpact * ( 100 - ( PERCENT_BULLET_SLOWED_BY_RANGE * iDistanceTravelled ) / iRange ) / 100 ) );
01933 
01934 }
01935 */
01936 
01937 BOOLEAN BulletHitMerc( BULLET * pBullet, STRUCTURE * pStructure, BOOLEAN fIntended )
01938 {
01939       INT32                                           iImpact, iDamage;
01940       EV_S_WEAPONHIT                SWeaponHit;
01941       INT16                                           sRange;
01942       SOLDIERTYPE *                       pFirer = pBullet->pFirer;
01943       FLOAT                                           dZPosRelToMerc;
01944       UINT8                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_RANDOM;
01945       UINT8                                           ubAttackDirection;
01946       UINT8                                           ubAmmoType;
01947       UINT32                                          uiChanceThrough;
01948       UINT8                                           ubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_NO_SPECIAL;
01949       INT16                                           sHitBy;
01950       BOOLEAN                                         fStopped = TRUE;
01951       INT8                                            bSlot;
01952       INT8                                            bHeadSlot = NO_SLOT;
01953       OBJECTTYPE                          Object;
01954       SOLDIERTYPE *                       pTarget;
01955   INT16               sNewGridNo;
01956   BOOLEAN             fCanSpewBlood = FALSE;
01957   INT8                bSpewBloodLevel;
01958 
01959       // structure IDs for mercs match their merc IDs
01960       pTarget = MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ];
01961       
01962       if (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE)
01963       {
01964             // Place knife on guy....
01965 
01966             // See if they have room ( and make sure it's not in hand pos?
01967             bSlot = FindEmptySlotWithin( pTarget, BIGPOCK1POS, SMALLPOCK8POS );
01968             if (bSlot == NO_SLOT)
01969             {
01970                   // Add item
01971                         
01972                   CreateItem( pBullet->fromItem, (INT8) pBullet->ubItemStatus, &Object );
01973 
01974                   AddItemToPool( pTarget->sGridNo, &Object, -1 , pTarget->bLevel, 0, 0 );
01975 
01976                   // Make team look for items
01977                   NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
01978             }
01979             else
01980             {
01981                   if ( Item[pBullet->fromItem].bloodieditem > 0 )
01982                         CreateItem( Item[pBullet->fromItem].bloodieditem, (INT8) pBullet->ubItemStatus, &(pTarget->inv[bSlot]) );
01983                   else  
01984                         CreateItem( pBullet->fromItem, (INT8) pBullet->ubItemStatus, &(pTarget->inv[bSlot]) );
01985             }
01986 
01987             ubAmmoType = AMMO_KNIFE;
01988       }
01989       else
01990       {
01991             ubAmmoType = pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType;
01992       }
01993 
01994       // at least partly compensate for "near miss" increases for this guy, after all, the bullet
01995       // actually hit him!
01996       // take this out for now at least... no longer certain that he was awarded a suppression pt
01997       // when the bullet got near him
01998       //pTarget->ubSuppressionPoints--;
01999 
02000       if ( pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE || (pTarget->ubBodyType == COW || pTarget->ubBodyType == CROW || pTarget->ubBodyType == BLOODCAT) )
02001       {
02002             //ubHitLocation = pStructure->ubVehicleHitLocation;
02003             ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
02004       }
02005       else
02006       {
02007             // Determine where the person was hit...
02008             
02009             if ( CREATURE_OR_BLOODCAT( pTarget )  )
02010             {
02011                   ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
02012 
02013                   // adult monster types have a weak spot
02014                   if ( (pTarget->ubBodyType >= ADULTFEMALEMONSTER) && (pTarget->ubBodyType <=   YAM_MONSTER) )
02015                   {
02016                         ubAttackDirection = (UINT8) GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( pBullet->pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo );
02017                         if ( ubAttackDirection == pTarget->bDirection || ubAttackDirection == gOneCCDirection[ pTarget->bDirection ] || ubAttackDirection == gOneCDirection[ pTarget->bDirection ] )
02018                         {
02019                               // may hit weak spot!
02020                               if (0) // check fact
02021                               {
02022                                     uiChanceThrough = 30;
02023                               }
02024                               else
02025                               {
02026                                     uiChanceThrough = 1;
02027                               }
02028 
02029                               if (PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceThrough)
02030                               {
02031                                     ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_GLAND;
02032                               }
02033                         }
02034                   }
02035             }
02036 
02037             if (ubHitLocation == AIM_SHOT_RANDOM) // i.e. if not set yet
02038             {
02039 
02040                   if (pTarget->bOverTerrainType == DEEP_WATER)
02041                   {
02042                         // automatic head hit!
02043                         ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
02044                   }
02045                   else
02046                   {
02047                         switch (gAnimControl[ pTarget->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight)
02048                         {
02049                               case ANIM_STAND:
02050                                     dZPosRelToMerc = FixedToFloat( pBullet->qCurrZ ) - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[pBullet->sGridNo].sHeight );
02051                                     if ( dZPosRelToMerc > HEIGHT_UNITS )
02052                                     {
02053                                           dZPosRelToMerc -= HEIGHT_UNITS;
02054                                     }
02055                                     if (dZPosRelToMerc > STANDING_HEAD_BOTTOM_POS)
02056                                     {
02057                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
02058                                     }
02059                                     else if (dZPosRelToMerc < STANDING_TORSO_BOTTOM_POS )
02060                                     {
02061                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_LEGS;
02062                                     }
02063                                     else
02064                                     {
02065                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
02066                                     }
02067                                     break;
02068                               case ANIM_CROUCH:
02069                                     dZPosRelToMerc = FixedToFloat( pBullet->qCurrZ ) - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[pBullet->sGridNo].sHeight );
02070                                     if ( dZPosRelToMerc > HEIGHT_UNITS )
02071                                     {
02072                                           dZPosRelToMerc -= HEIGHT_UNITS;
02073                                     }
02074                                     if (dZPosRelToMerc > CROUCHED_HEAD_BOTTOM_POS)
02075                                     {
02076                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_HEAD;
02077                                     }
02078                                     else if ( dZPosRelToMerc < CROUCHED_TORSO_BOTTOM_POS )
02079                                     {
02080                                           // prevent targets in water from being hit in legs
02081                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_LEGS;
02082                                     }
02083                                     else
02084                                     {
02085                                           ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
02086                                     }
02087                                     break;
02088                               case ANIM_PRONE:
02089                                     ubHitLocation = AIM_SHOT_TORSO;
02090                                     break;
02091 
02092                         }
02093                   }
02094             }
02095 
02096             if ( ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].monsterSpit ) && (ubHitLocation == AIM_SHOT_HEAD) && ( ! (pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER) ) )
02097             {
02098                   UINT8             ubOppositeDirection;
02099 
02100                   ubAttackDirection = (UINT8) GetDirectionToGridNoFromGridNo( pBullet->pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo );
02101                   ubOppositeDirection = gOppositeDirection[ ubAttackDirection ];
02102 
02103                   if ( ! ( ubOppositeDirection == pTarget->bDirection || ubAttackDirection == gOneCCDirection[ pTarget->bDirection ] || ubAttackDirection == gOneCDirection[ pTarget->bDirection ] ) )
02104                   {
02105                         // lucky bastard was facing away!
02106                   }
02107 //                else if ( ( (pTarget->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem == NIGHTGOGGLES) || (pTarget->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem == SUNGOGGLES) || (pTarget->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem == GASMASK) ) && ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32) (pTarget->inv[HEAD1POS].bStatus[ 0 ]) ) )
02108                   else if ( ( (pTarget->inv[HEAD1POS].usItem != NONE) ) && ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32) (pTarget->inv[HEAD1POS].bStatus[ 0 ]) ) )
02109                   {
02110                         // lucky bastard was wearing protective stuff
02111                         bHeadSlot = HEAD1POS;
02112                   }
02113                   else if ( ( (pTarget->inv[HEAD2POS].usItem != NONE) ) && ( PreRandom( 100 ) < (UINT32) (pTarget->inv[HEAD2POS].bStatus[ 0 ]) ) )
02114                   {
02115                         // lucky bastard was wearing protective stuff
02116                         bHeadSlot = HEAD2POS;
02117                   }
02118                   else
02119                   {
02120                         // splat!!
02121                         ubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_BLINDED_BY_SPIT_SPECIAL;
02122                   }
02123 
02124             }
02125 
02126       }
02127 
02128       // Determine damage, checking guy's armour, etc
02129   sRange = (INT16)GetRangeInCellCoordsFromGridNoDiff( pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget->sGridNo );
02130       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & GODMODE  && !(pFirer->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_PC))   
02131       {
02132             // in god mode, and firer is computer controlled
02133             iImpact = 0;
02134             iDamage = 0;
02135       }
02136       else if (fIntended)
02137       {
02138             if (pFirer->bOppList[pTarget->ubID] == SEEN_CURRENTLY)
02139             {
02140                   sHitBy = pBullet->sHitBy;
02141             }
02142             else
02143             {
02144                   // hard to aim at something far away being reported by someone else!
02145                   sHitBy = pBullet->sHitBy / 2;
02146             }
02147             // hit the intended target which was in our LOS
02148             // reduce due to range
02149             iImpact = pBullet->iImpact; //BulletImpactReducedByRange( pBullet->iImpact, pBullet->iLoop, pBullet->iRange );          
02150             iImpact -= pBullet->iImpactReduction;
02151             if (iImpact < 0)
02152             {
02153                   // shouldn't happen but
02154                   iImpact = 0;
02155             }
02156             iDamage = BulletImpact( pFirer, pTarget, ubHitLocation, iImpact, sHitBy, &ubSpecial );
02157             // handle hit here...
02158             if( ( pFirer->bTeam == 0 ) )
02159             {
02160                   gMercProfiles[ pFirer->ubProfile ].usShotsHit++;
02161             }
02162 
02163             // intentionally shot
02164             pTarget->fIntendedTarget = TRUE;
02165 
02166             if ( (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_BUCKSHOT) && ( pTarget->ubID == pFirer->ubTargetID ) )
02167             {
02168                   pTarget->bNumPelletsHitBy++;
02169             }
02170       }
02171       else
02172       {
02173             // if an accidental target was hit, don't give a bonus for good aim!
02174             sHitBy = 0;
02175             iImpact = pBullet->iImpact; 
02176             //iImpact = BulletImpactReducedByRange( pBullet->iImpact, pBullet->iLoop, pBullet->iRange );
02177             iImpact -= pBullet->iImpactReduction;
02178             if (iImpact < 0)
02179             {
02180                   // shouldn't happen but
02181                   iImpact = 0;
02182             }
02183             iDamage = BulletImpact( pFirer, pTarget, ubHitLocation, iImpact, sHitBy, &ubSpecial );
02184             
02185             // accidentally shot
02186             pTarget->fIntendedTarget = FALSE;
02187       }
02188 
02189       if ( AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].monsterSpit )
02190       {
02191             if (bHeadSlot != NO_SLOT)
02192             {
02193                   pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].bStatus[ 0 ] -= (INT8) ( (iImpact / 2) + Random( (iImpact / 2) ) );
02194                   if ( pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].bStatus[ 0 ] <= USABLE )
02195                   {
02196                         if ( pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].bStatus[ 0 ] <= 0 )
02197                         {
02198                               DeleteObj( &(pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ]) );
02199                               DirtyMercPanelInterface( pTarget, DIRTYLEVEL2 );
02200                         }
02201                         // say curse?
02202                   }
02203             }
02204       }
02205       else if (ubHitLocation == AIM_SHOT_HEAD)
02206       {
02207             // bullet to the head may damage any head item
02208             bHeadSlot = HEAD1POS + (INT8) Random( 2 );
02209             if ( pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].usItem != NOTHING )
02210             {
02211                   pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].bStatus[ 0 ] -= (INT8) ( Random( iImpact / 2 ) );
02212                   if ( pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].bStatus[ 0 ] < 0 )
02213                   {
02214                         // just break it...
02215                         pTarget->inv[ bHeadSlot ].bStatus[ 0 ] = 1;
02216                   }
02217             }
02218       }
02219 
02220       // check to see if the guy is a friendly?..if so, up the number of times wounded
02221       if( ( pTarget->bTeam == gbPlayerNum ) )
02222       {
02223             gMercProfiles[ pTarget->ubProfile ].usTimesWounded++;
02224       }
02225 
02226       // check to see if someone was accidentally hit when no target was specified by the player
02227       if ( pFirer->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pFirer->ubTargetID == NOBODY && pTarget->bNeutral  )
02228       {
02229             if ( pTarget->ubCivilianGroup == KINGPIN_CIV_GROUP || pTarget->ubCivilianGroup == HICKS_CIV_GROUP )
02230             {
02231                   // hicks and kingpin are touchy!
02232                   pFirer->ubTargetID = pTarget->ubID;
02233             }
02234             else if ( Random( 100 ) < 60 )
02235             {
02236                   // get touchy
02237                   pFirer->ubTargetID = pTarget->ubID;
02238             }
02239             
02240       }
02241 
02242 
02243       // Send event for getting hit 
02244       memset( &(SWeaponHit), 0, sizeof( SWeaponHit ) );
02245       SWeaponHit.usSoldierID              = pTarget->ubID;
02246       SWeaponHit.uiUniqueId                     = pTarget->uiUniqueSoldierIdValue;
02247       SWeaponHit.usWeaponIndex            = pFirer->usAttackingWeapon;
02248       SWeaponHit.sDamage                              = (INT16) iDamage;
02249       // breath loss is based on original impact of bullet
02250       SWeaponHit.sBreathLoss              = (INT16) ( (iImpact * BP_GET_WOUNDED * (pTarget->bBreathMax * 100 - pTarget->sBreathRed)) / 10000 );
02251       SWeaponHit.usDirection              = GetDirectionFromGridNo( pFirer->sGridNo, pTarget );
02252       SWeaponHit.sXPos                                = (INT16)pTarget->dXPos;
02253       SWeaponHit.sYPos                                = (INT16)pTarget->dYPos;
02254       SWeaponHit.sZPos                                = 20;
02255       SWeaponHit.sRange                               = sRange;
02256       SWeaponHit.ubAttackerID             = pFirer->ubID;
02257       SWeaponHit.fHit                                       = TRUE;
02258       SWeaponHit.ubLocation                     = ubHitLocation;
02259 
02260       if ( (pFirer->bDoBurst) && (ubSpecial == FIRE_WEAPON_NO_SPECIAL) )
02261       {
02262             // the animation required by the bullet hit (head explosion etc) overrides the
02263             // hit-by-a-burst animation
02264             ubSpecial = FIRE_WEAPON_BURST_SPECIAL;
02265       }
02266       SWeaponHit.ubSpecial = ubSpecial;
02267 
02268       // now check to see if the bullet goes THROUGH this person! (not vehicles)
02269       if ( !(pTarget->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE) && (AmmoTypes[ubAmmoType].canGoThrough) && !EXPLOSIVE_GUN( pFirer->usAttackingWeapon ) )
02270       {
02271             // if we do more damage than expected, then the bullet will be more likely
02272             // to be lodged in the body
02273 
02274             // if we do less than expected, then the bullet has been slowed and less
02275             // likely to continue
02276 
02277             // higher chance for bigger guns, because they'll go through the back armour
02278 
02279             // reduce impact to match damage, if damage wasn't more than the impact
02280             // due to good aim, etc.
02281             if (iDamage < iImpact)
02282             {
02283                   iImpact = iDamage;
02284             }
02285             uiChanceThrough = (UINT8) __max( 0, ( iImpact - 20 ) );
02286             if (PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceThrough )
02287             {
02288                   // bullet MAY go through
02289                   // adjust for bullet going through person
02290                   iImpact -= CalcBodyImpactReduction( ubAmmoType, ubHitLocation );
02291                   // adjust for other side of armour!
02292                   iImpact -= TotalArmourProtection( pFirer, pTarget, ubHitLocation, iImpact, ubAmmoType );
02293                   if (iImpact > 0)
02294                   {
02295                         pBullet->iImpact = (INT8) iImpact;
02296                         // bullet was NOT stopped
02297                         fStopped = FALSE;
02298                   }
02299             }
02300       }
02301 
02302       if (fStopped)
02303       {
02304             RemoveBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
02305       }
02306   else
02307   {
02308     // ATE: I'm in enemy territory again, evil CC's world :)
02309     // This looks like the place I should add code to spew blood on the ground
02310     // The algorithm I'm going to use is given the current gridno of bullet,
02311     // get a new gridno based on direction it was moving.  Check to see if we're not
02312     // going through walls, etc by testing for a path, unless on the roof, in which case it would always
02313     // be legal, but the bLevel May change...
02314       sNewGridNo = NewGridNo( (INT16)pBullet->sGridNo, DirectionInc( gOppositeDirection[ SWeaponHit.usDirection ] ) );
02315 
02316     bSpewBloodLevel = MercPtrs[ SWeaponHit.usSoldierID ]->bLevel;
02317     fCanSpewBlood   = TRUE;
02318 
02319     // If on anything other than bLevel of 0, we can pretty much freely spew blood
02320     if ( bSpewBloodLevel == 0 )
02321     {
02322       if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ sNewGridNo ][ gOppositeDirection[ SWeaponHit.usDirection ] ][ 0 ] >= TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED )
02323       {
02324         fCanSpewBlood = FALSE;
02325       }
02326     }
02327     else
02328     {
02329       // If a roof does not exist here, make level = 0
02330       if ( !IsRoofPresentAtGridno( sNewGridNo ) )
02331       {
02332         bSpewBloodLevel = 0;
02333       }
02334     }
02335 
02336     if ( fCanSpewBlood )
02337     {
02338       // Drop blood dude!
02339                   InternalDropBlood( sNewGridNo, bSpewBloodLevel, 0, (UINT8)(MAXBLOODQUANTITY), 1 );
02340     }
02341   }
02342 
02343   if ( gTacticalStatus.ubCurrentTeam != OUR_TEAM && pTarget->bTeam == gbPlayerNum )
02344   {
02345         // someone has been hit so no close-call quotes
02346         gTacticalStatus.fSomeoneHit = TRUE;
02347   }
02348 
02349       // handle hit!
02350       WeaponHit( SWeaponHit.usSoldierID, SWeaponHit.usWeaponIndex, SWeaponHit.sDamage, SWeaponHit.sBreathLoss, SWeaponHit.usDirection, SWeaponHit.sXPos, SWeaponHit.sYPos, SWeaponHit.sZPos, SWeaponHit.sRange, SWeaponHit.ubAttackerID, SWeaponHit.fHit, SWeaponHit.ubSpecial, SWeaponHit.ubLocation );
02351       return( fStopped );
02352 }
02353 
02354 void BulletHitStructure( BULLET * pBullet, UINT16 usStructureID, INT32 iImpact, SOLDIERTYPE * pFirer, FIXEDPT qCurrX, FIXEDPT qCurrY, FIXEDPT qCurrZ, BOOLEAN fStopped )
02355 {
02356       EV_S_STRUCTUREHIT       SStructureHit;
02357 
02358       SStructureHit.sXPos = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrX + FloatToFixed( 0.5f ) ); // + 0.5);
02359       SStructureHit.sYPos = (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrY + FloatToFixed( 0.5f ) ); // (dCurrY + 0.5);
02360       SStructureHit.sZPos = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_PIXELS( (INT16) FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( qCurrZ + FloatToFixed( 0.5f )) );// dCurrZ + 0.5) );
02361       SStructureHit.usWeaponIndex = pFirer->usAttackingWeapon;
02362       SStructureHit.bWeaponStatus = pBullet->ubItemStatus;
02363       SStructureHit.ubAttackerID    = pFirer->ubID;
02364       SStructureHit.usStructureID = usStructureID;
02365       SStructureHit.iImpact                     = iImpact;
02366       SStructureHit.iBullet                     = pBullet->iBullet;
02367 
02368       StructureHit( SStructureHit.iBullet, SStructureHit.usWeaponIndex, SStructureHit.bWeaponStatus, SStructureHit.ubAttackerID, SStructureHit.sXPos, SStructureHit.sYPos, SStructureHit.sZPos, SStructureHit.usStructureID, SStructureHit.iImpact, fStopped );
02369 }
02370 
02371 void BulletHitWindow( BULLET *pBullet, INT16 sGridNo, UINT16 usStructureID, BOOLEAN fBlowWindowSouth )
02372 {
02373       WindowHit( sGridNo, usStructureID, fBlowWindowSouth, FALSE );
02374 }
02375 
02376 void BulletMissed( BULLET *pBullet, SOLDIERTYPE * pFirer )
02377 {
02378       ShotMiss( pFirer->ubID, pBullet->iBullet );
02379 }
02380 
02381 UINT32 ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure( INT32 iDistance, INT32 iDistanceToTarget, INT16 sHitBy )
02382 {
02383       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure"));
02384       INT32 iCloseToCoverPenalty;
02385 
02386       if (iDistance / CELL_X_SIZE > MAX_DIST_FOR_LESS_THAN_MAX_CHANCE_TO_HIT_STRUCTURE)
02387       {
02388             return( MAX_CHANCE_OF_HITTING_STRUCTURE );
02389       }
02390       else
02391       {
02392             iCloseToCoverPenalty = iDistance / 5 - (iDistanceToTarget - iDistance);
02393             if (iCloseToCoverPenalty < 0)
02394             {
02395                   iCloseToCoverPenalty = 0;
02396             }
02397             if (sHitBy < 0)
02398             {
02399                   // add 20% to distance so that misses hit nearer obstacles a bit more
02400                   iDistance += iDistance / 5;
02401             }
02402             if ( ( (iDistance + iCloseToCoverPenalty) / CELL_X_SIZE ) > MAX_DIST_FOR_LESS_THAN_MAX_CHANCE_TO_HIT_STRUCTURE )
02403             {
02404                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure done"));
02405                   return( MAX_CHANCE_OF_HITTING_STRUCTURE );
02406             }
02407             else
02408             {
02409                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure done"));
02410                   return( guiStructureHitChance[ (iDistance + iCloseToCoverPenalty) / CELL_X_SIZE ] );
02411             }
02412       }
02413 }
02414 
02415 INT32 StructureResistanceIncreasedByRange( INT32 iImpactReduction, INT32 iGunRange, INT32 iDistance ) 
02416 {     
02417       return( iImpactReduction * ( 100 + PERCENT_BULLET_SLOWED_BY_RANGE * (iDistance - iGunRange) / iGunRange ) / 100 );
02418       /*
02419       if ( iDistance > iGunRange )
02420       {
02421             return( iImpactReduction * ( 100 + PERCENT_BULLET_SLOWED_BY_RANGE * (iDistance - iGunRange) / iGunRange ) / 100 );
02422       }
02423       else
02424       {
02425             return( iImpactReduction );
02426       }
02427       */
02428 }
02429 
02430 
02431 INT32 HandleBulletStructureInteraction( BULLET * pBullet, STRUCTURE * pStructure, BOOLEAN * pfHit )
02432 {
02433       DOOR        *pDoor;
02434       INT16       sLockDamage;
02435 
02436       // returns remaining impact amount
02437 
02438 
02439       INT32 iCurrImpact;
02440       INT32 iImpactReduction;
02441 
02442       *pfHit = FALSE;
02443 
02444       if (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE || pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE || pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON || pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_FLAME )
02445       {
02446             // stops!
02447             *pfHit = TRUE;
02448             return( 0 );
02449       }
02450       //else if ( pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE )
02451       //{
02452             // stops if using HE ammo
02453       else if ( AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].highExplosive && !AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].antiTank )
02454       {
02455             *pfHit = TRUE;
02456             return( 0 );
02457       }
02458 //    }
02459 
02460       // ATE: Alrighty, check for shooting door locks...
02461       // First check this is a type of struct that can handle locks...
02462       if ( pStructure->fFlags & ( STRUCTURE_DOOR | STRUCTURE_OPENABLE ) && PythSpacesAway( (INT16) pBullet->sTargetGridNo, pStructure->sGridNo ) <= 2 )
02463       {
02464             // lookup lock table to see if we have a lock,
02465             // and then remove lock if enough damage done....
02466             pDoor = FindDoorInfoAtGridNo( pBullet->sGridNo );
02467  
02468             // Does it have a lock?
02469             INT16 lockBustingPower = AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].lockBustingPower;
02470 
02471             // WANNE: bugfix: No door returned, so the game crashes!
02472             if (pDoor)
02473             {
02474                   DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Door info: damage = %d, pick difficulty = %d, smash difficulty = %d, lockbuster power = %d",pDoor->bLockDamage,LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubPickDifficulty,LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubSmashDifficulty,lockBustingPower) );
02475 
02476                   if ( pDoor && (( LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubPickDifficulty < 50 && LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubSmashDifficulty < 70 ) || lockBustingPower*2 >= LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubSmashDifficulty ) )
02477                   {
02478                         // Yup.....
02479 
02480                         // Chance that it hit the lock....
02481                         if ( PreRandom( 2 ) == 0 || lockBustingPower > 0 )
02482                         {
02483                               // Adjust damage-- CC adjust this based on gun type, etc.....
02484                               //sLockDamage = (INT16)( 35 + Random( 35 ) );
02485                               sLockDamage = (INT16) (pBullet->iImpact - pBullet->iImpactReduction );
02486                               sLockDamage += (INT16) PreRandom( sLockDamage );
02487                               sLockDamage += lockBustingPower;
02488 
02489                               sLockDamage = min(sLockDamage,127);
02490 
02491                               ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ LOCK_HAS_BEEN_HIT ] );
02492 
02493                               //Madd: catch the overflow
02494                               if ( sLockDamage + pDoor->bLockDamage > 127 )
02495                                     pDoor->bLockDamage = 127;
02496                               else
02497                                     pDoor->bLockDamage+= sLockDamage;
02498 
02499                               // Check if it has been shot!
02500                               if ( pDoor->bLockDamage > LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubSmashDifficulty || sLockDamage > LockTable[ pDoor->ubLockID ].ubSmashDifficulty )
02501                               {
02502                                     // Display message!
02503                                     ScreenMsg( FONT_MCOLOR_LTYELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, TacticalStr[ LOCK_HAS_BEEN_DESTROYED ] );
02504 
02505                                     // succeeded! door can never be locked again, so remove from door list...
02506                                     RemoveDoorInfoFromTable( pDoor->sGridNo );
02507 
02508                                     // MARKSMANSHIP GAIN (marksPts): Opened/Damaged a door
02509                                     StatChange( pBullet->pFirer, MARKAMT, 10, FALSE );
02510 
02511                               }
02512                         }
02513                   }
02514             }
02515       }
02516 
02517       // okay, this seems pretty weird, so here's the comment to explain it:
02518       // iImpactReduction is the reduction in impact due to the structure
02519       // pBullet->iImpactReduction is the accumulated reduction in impact
02520       //   for all bullets encountered thus far
02521       // iCurrImpact is the original impact value of the bullet reduced due to
02522       //   range.  To avoid problems involving multiple multiplication
02523       //   ( (1 - X) * (1 - Y) != (1 - X - Y) ! ), this is calculated from
02524       //     scratch at each collision with an obstacle
02525       //   reduction due to range is 25% per "max range"
02526       if (PreRandom( 100 ) < pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity)
02527       {
02528             iCurrImpact = pBullet->iImpact; 
02529             //iCurrImpact = BulletImpactReducedByRange( pBullet->iImpact, pBullet->iLoop, pBullet->iRange );
02530             iImpactReduction = gubMaterialArmour[ pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour ];
02531             iImpactReduction = StructureResistanceIncreasedByRange( iImpactReduction, pBullet->iRange, pBullet->iLoop );
02532 
02533             iImpactReduction = (INT32) (iImpactReduction * AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].structureImpactReductionMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].structureImpactReductionDivisor));
02534 
02535             //switch (pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType)
02536             //{
02537             //    case AMMO_HP:
02538             //          iImpactReduction = AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iImpactReduction );
02539             //          break;
02540             //    case AMMO_AP:
02541             //    case AMMO_HEAT:
02542             //          iImpactReduction = AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_AP( iImpactReduction );
02543             //          break;
02544             //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
02545             //          iImpactReduction = AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( iImpactReduction );
02546             //          break;
02547             //    default:
02548             //          break;
02549             //}
02550 
02551             pBullet->iImpactReduction += iImpactReduction;
02552 
02553             // really weak stuff like grass should never *stop* a bullet, maybe slow it though
02554             if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour == MATERIAL_LIGHT_VEGETATION )
02555             {
02556                   // just return a +ve value to indicate the bullet wasn't stopped
02557                   *pfHit = FALSE;
02558                   return( 1 );
02559             }
02560 
02561             *pfHit = TRUE;
02562             return( iCurrImpact - pBullet->iImpactReduction );
02563       }
02564       else
02565       {
02566             // just return a +ve value to indicate the bullet wasn't stopped
02567             *pfHit = FALSE;
02568             return( 1 );
02569       }
02570 }
02571 
02572 INT32 CTGTHandleBulletStructureInteraction( BULLET * pBullet, STRUCTURE * pStructure )
02573 {
02574       // returns reduction in impact for summing in CTGT
02575 
02576       INT32 iCurrImpact;
02577       INT32 iImpactReduction;
02578 
02579       if (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE || pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE || pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_FLAME || pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON )
02580       {
02581             // knife/rocket stops when it hits anything, and people block completely
02582             return( pBullet->iImpact );
02583       }
02584       //else if ( pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE )
02585       //{
02586             // stops if using HE ammo
02587       else if ( AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].highExplosive && !AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].antiTank )
02588       {
02589             return( pBullet->iImpact );
02590       }
02591 //    }
02592       else if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PERSON )
02593       {
02594             if ( pStructure->usStructureID != pBullet->ubFirerID && pStructure->usStructureID != pBullet->ubTargetID )
02595             {
02596             }
02597       }
02598 
02599       // okay, this seems pretty weird, so here's the comment to explain it:
02600       // iImpactReduction is the reduction in impact due to the structure
02601       // pBullet->iImpactReduction is the accumulated reduction in impact
02602       //   for all bullets encountered thus far
02603       // iCurrImpact is the original impact value of the bullet reduced due to
02604       //   range.  To avoid problems involving multiple multiplication
02605       //   ( (1 - X) * (1 - Y) != (1 - X - Y) ! ), this is calculated from
02606       //     scratch at each collision with an obstacle
02607       //   reduction due to range is 25% per "max range"
02608       //iCurrImpact = BulletImpactReducedByRange( pBullet->iImpact, pBullet->iLoop, pBullet->iRange );
02609       iCurrImpact = pBullet->iImpact;
02610       // multiply impact reduction by 100 to retain fractions for a bit...
02611       iImpactReduction = gubMaterialArmour[ pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour ] * pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity / 100;
02612       iImpactReduction = StructureResistanceIncreasedByRange( iImpactReduction, pBullet->iRange, pBullet->iLoop );
02613 
02614       iImpactReduction = (INT32)(iImpactReduction * AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].structureImpactReductionMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType].structureImpactReductionDivisor));
02615 
02616       //switch (pBullet->pFirer->inv[ pBullet->pFirer->ubAttackingHand ].ubGunAmmoType)
02617       //{
02618       //    case AMMO_HP:
02619       //          iImpactReduction = AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_HP( iImpactReduction );
02620       //          break;
02621       //    case AMMO_AP:
02622       //          iImpactReduction = AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_AP( iImpactReduction );
02623       //          break;
02624       //    case AMMO_SUPER_AP:
02625       //          iImpactReduction = AMMO_STRUCTURE_ADJUSTMENT_SAP( iImpactReduction );
02626       //          break;
02627       //    default:
02628       //          break;
02629       //}
02630       return( iImpactReduction );
02631 }
02632 
02633 
02634 UINT8 CalcChanceToGetThrough( BULLET * pBullet )
02635 {
02636       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough"));
02637 
02638       FIXEDPT     qLandHeight;
02639       INT32       iCurrAboveLevelZ;
02640       INT32       iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ;
02641       INT16       sDesiredLevel;
02642 
02643       INT32       iOldTileX;
02644       INT32       iOldTileY;
02645       INT32       iOldCubesZ;
02646 
02647       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
02648       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
02649       STRUCTURE *             pRoofStructure = NULL;
02650 
02651       FIXEDPT                             qLastZ;
02652 
02653       BOOLEAN                             fIntended;
02654       INT8                                bOldLOSIndexX;
02655       INT8                                bOldLOSIndexY;
02656 
02657       INT32                               iChanceToGetThrough = 100;
02658 
02659       FIXEDPT                             qDistToTravelX;
02660       FIXEDPT                             qDistToTravelY;
02661       INT32                               iStepsToTravelX;
02662       INT32                               iStepsToTravelY;
02663       INT32                               iStepsToTravel;
02664       INT32                               iNumLocalStructures;
02665       INT32                               iStructureLoop;
02666       UINT32                              uiChanceOfHit;
02667       INT32                               iGridNo;
02668       INT32                               iTotalStructureImpact;
02669       BOOLEAN                             fResolveHit;
02670 
02671       FIXEDPT                             qWallHeight;
02672       FIXEDPT                             qWindowBottomHeight;
02673       FIXEDPT                             qWindowTopHeight;
02674 
02675       DebugLOS( "Starting CalcChanceToGetThrough" );
02676 
02677       do
02678       {
02679             // check a particular tile
02680             // retrieve values from world for this particular tile
02681             iGridNo = pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS;
02682             DebugLOS( String( "CTGT now at %ld", iGridNo ) );
02683             pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ] );
02684             qLandHeight = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( pMapElement->sHeight ) );
02685             qWallHeight = gqStandardWallHeight + qLandHeight;
02686             qWindowBottomHeight = gqStandardWindowBottomHeight + qLandHeight;
02687             qWindowTopHeight = gqStandardWindowTopHeight + qLandHeight;
02688 
02689             // Assemble list of structures we might hit!
02690             iNumLocalStructures = 0;
02691             pStructure = pMapElement->pStructureHead;
02692             // calculate chance of hitting each structure
02693             uiChanceOfHit = ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure( pBullet->iLoop, pBullet->iDistanceLimit, 0 );
02694 
02695             // reset roof structure pointer each tile
02696             pRoofStructure = NULL;
02697 
02698             if (iGridNo == (INT32) pBullet->sTargetGridNo)
02699             {
02700                   fIntended = TRUE;
02701                   // if in the same tile as our destination, we WANT to hit the structure!
02702                   uiChanceOfHit = 100;
02703             }
02704             else
02705             {
02706                   fIntended = FALSE;
02707             }
02708 
02709             iCurrAboveLevelZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ - qLandHeight );
02710             if (iCurrAboveLevelZ < 0)
02711             {
02712                   // ground is in the way!
02713                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough done ground is in the way"));
02714                   return( 0 );
02715             }
02716             iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
02717             
02718             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough: while pStructure"));
02719             while( pStructure )
02720             {
02721                   if (pStructure->fFlags & ALWAYS_CONSIDER_HIT)
02722                   {
02723                         // ALWAYS add walls
02724                         gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
02725                         // fence is special
02726                         //(iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= iStartCubesAboveLevelZ)
02727                         if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYFENCE )
02728                         {
02729                               if (pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity < 100)
02730                               {
02731                                     guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = uiChanceOfHit;
02732                               }
02733                               else if ( (pBullet->iLoop <= CLOSE_TO_FIRER) && (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= pBullet->bStartCubesAboveLevelZ) && (pBullet->bEndCubesAboveLevelZ >= iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ) && iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ == (StructureHeight( pStructure ) - 1) )
02734                               {
02735                                     guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = uiChanceOfHit;
02736                               }
02737                               else if ( (pBullet->iLoop + pBullet->iDistanceLimit / 50 >= pBullet->iDistanceLimit - CLOSE_TO_FIRER) && (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= pBullet->bEndCubesAboveLevelZ) && iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ == (StructureHeight( pStructure ) - 1) )
02738                               {
02739                                     guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = uiChanceOfHit;
02740                               }
02741                               else
02742                               {
02743                                     guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = 100;
02744                               }                             
02745                         }
02746                         else
02747                         {
02748                               guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = 100;
02749                         }
02750                         gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
02751                         iNumLocalStructures++;
02752                   }
02753                   else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ROOF)
02754                   {
02755                         // only consider roofs if the flag is set; don't add them to the array since they
02756                         // are a special case
02757                         if (pBullet->fCheckForRoof)
02758                         {
02759                               pRoofStructure = pStructure;
02760 
02761                               if ( pRoofStructure )
02762                               {
02763                                     qLastZ = pBullet->qCurrZ - pBullet->qIncrZ;
02764 
02765                                     // if just on going to next tile we cross boundary, then roof stops bullet here!
02766                                     if ( (qLastZ > qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ <= qWallHeight) || (qLastZ < qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ >= qWallHeight))
02767                                     {
02768                                           // hit a roof
02769                                           //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceChanceToGetThrough done hit a roof" ));
02770 
02771                                           return( 0 );
02772                                     }
02773                               }
02774 
02775                         }
02776                   }
02777                   else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PERSON)
02778                   {
02779                         if ( (pStructure->usStructureID != pBullet->ubFirerID) && (pStructure->usStructureID != pBullet->ubTargetID ) )
02780                         {
02781                               // ignore intended target since we will get closure upon reaching the center
02782                               // of the destination tile
02783 
02784                               // ignore intervening target if not visible; PCs are always visible so AI will never skip them on that
02785                               // basis
02786                               if ( !fIntended && (MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->bVisible == TRUE) )
02787                               {
02788                                     // in actually moving the bullet, we consider only count friends as targets if the bullet is unaimed
02789                                     // (buckshot), if they are the intended target, or beyond the range of automatic friendly fire hits
02790                                     // OR a 1 in 30 chance occurs
02791                                     if (gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[pStructure->usStructureID]->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND &&
02792                                                       ( (pBullet->fAimed && pBullet->iLoop > MIN_DIST_FOR_HIT_FRIENDS) ||
02793                                                             (!pBullet->fAimed && pBullet->iLoop > MIN_DIST_FOR_HIT_FRIENDS_UNAIMED)
02794                                                       )
02795                                                 )
02796                                     {
02797                                           // could hit this person!
02798                                           gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
02799                                           // CJC commented this out because of tank trying to shoot through another tank
02800                                           //guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = uiChanceOfHit;
02801                                           guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = 100;
02802                                           gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
02803                                           iNumLocalStructures++;
02804                                     }
02805                                     else
02806                                     {
02807                                           // minimal chance of hitting this person
02808                                           gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
02809                                           guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = MIN_CHANCE_TO_ACCIDENTALLY_HIT_SOMEONE;
02810                                           gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
02811                                           iNumLocalStructures++;
02812                                     }
02813                               }
02814                         }
02815                   }
02816                   else if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CORPSE )
02817                   {
02818                         if ( iGridNo == (INT32) pBullet->sTargetGridNo || (pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles >= 10) )
02819                         {
02820                               // could hit this corpse!
02821                               // but we should ignore the corpse if there is someone standing there
02822                               if ( FindStructure( (INT16) iGridNo, STRUCTURE_PERSON ) == NULL )
02823                               {
02824                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
02825                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
02826                               }
02827                         }
02828                   }
02829                   else
02830                   {
02831                         if ( pBullet->iLoop > CLOSE_TO_FIRER && !fIntended )
02832                         {
02833                               // could hit it
02834 
02835                               gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
02836                               guiLocalStructureCTH[iNumLocalStructures] = uiChanceOfHit;
02837                               gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
02838                               iNumLocalStructures++;
02839                         }
02840                   }
02841                   pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
02842             }
02843             
02844             // record old tile location for loop purposes
02845             iOldTileX = pBullet->iCurrTileX;
02846             iOldTileY = pBullet->iCurrTileY;
02847 
02848             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough: checking for location within the tile"));
02849             do
02850             {
02851                   // check a particular location within the tile
02852 
02853                   // check for collision with the ground
02854                   iCurrAboveLevelZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ - qLandHeight );
02855                   if (iCurrAboveLevelZ < 0)
02856                   {
02857                         // ground is in the way!
02858                         //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure done ground in way"));
02859 
02860                         return( 0 );
02861                   }
02862                   // check for the existence of structures
02863                   pStructure = pMapElement->pStructureHead;
02864                   if (pStructure == NULL)
02865                   {     // no structures in this tile, and THAT INCLUDES ROOFS AND PEOPLE! :-)
02866                         // new system; figure out how many steps until we cross the next edge
02867                         // and then fast forward that many steps.
02868 
02869                         iOldTileX = pBullet->iCurrTileX;
02870                         iOldTileY = pBullet->iCurrTileY;
02871                         iOldCubesZ = pBullet->iCurrCubesZ;
02872 
02873                         if (pBullet->qIncrX > 0)
02874                         {
02875                               qDistToTravelX = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ) - (pBullet->qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ));
02876                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / pBullet->qIncrX;
02877                         }
02878                         else if (pBullet->qIncrX < 0)
02879                         {
02880                               qDistToTravelX = pBullet->qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE );
02881                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / (-pBullet->qIncrX);
02882                         }
02883                         else
02884                         {
02885                               // make sure we don't consider X a limit :-)
02886                               iStepsToTravelX = 1000000;
02887                         }
02888 
02889                         if (pBullet->qIncrY > 0)
02890                         {
02891                               qDistToTravelY = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ) - (pBullet->qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ));                       
02892                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / pBullet->qIncrY;
02893                         }
02894                         else if (pBullet->qIncrY < 0)
02895                         {
02896                               qDistToTravelY = pBullet->qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE );
02897                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / (-pBullet->qIncrY);
02898                         }
02899                         else
02900                         {
02901                               // make sure we don't consider Y a limit :-)
02902                               iStepsToTravelY = 1000000;
02903                         }
02904 
02905                         // add 1 to the # of steps to travel to go INTO the next tile
02906                         iStepsToTravel = __min( iStepsToTravelX, iStepsToTravelY ) + 1;
02907 
02908                         pBullet->qCurrX += pBullet->qIncrX * iStepsToTravel;
02909                         pBullet->qCurrY += pBullet->qIncrY * iStepsToTravel;
02910                         pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ * iStepsToTravel;
02911                         pBullet->iLoop += iStepsToTravel;
02912 
02913                         // check for ground collision
02914                         if (pBullet->qCurrZ < qLandHeight && pBullet->iLoop < pBullet->iDistanceLimit)
02915                         {
02916                               // ground is in the way!
02917                                           //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceChanceToGetThrough done ground in way" ));
02918                               return( 0 );
02919                         }
02920 
02921                         // figure out the new tile location
02922                         pBullet->iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( pBullet->qCurrX );
02923                         pBullet->iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( pBullet->qCurrY );
02924                         pBullet->iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ ) );
02925                         pBullet->bLOSIndexX = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( pBullet->qCurrX );
02926                         pBullet->bLOSIndexY = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( pBullet->qCurrY );
02927 
02928                         DebugLOS( String( "  CTGT at %ld %ld after traversing empty tile", pBullet->bLOSIndexX, pBullet->bLOSIndexY ) );
02929 
02930                   }
02931                   else 
02932                   {
02933                         // there are structures in this tile
02934 
02935                         iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
02936 
02937                         // figure out the LOS cube level of the current point
02938                         if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF_MAX)
02939                         {
02940                               if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX) 
02941                               {
02942                                     // check objects on the ground
02943                                     sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
02944                               }
02945                               else
02946                               {
02947                                     // check objects on roofs
02948                                     sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
02949                                     iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ -= STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
02950                               }
02951                               // check structures for collision
02952                               for ( iStructureLoop = 0; iStructureLoop < iNumLocalStructures; iStructureLoop++)
02953                               {
02954                                     pStructure = gpLocalStructure[iStructureLoop];
02955                                     if (pStructure && pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel)
02956                                     {
02957                                           if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[pBullet->bLOSIndexX][pBullet->bLOSIndexY] & AtHeight[iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ]) > 0)
02958                                           {
02959                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PERSON)
02960                                                 {
02961                                                       // hit someone?
02962                                                       if (fIntended)
02963                                                       {     // gotcha! ... return chance to get through
02964                                                             iChanceToGetThrough = iChanceToGetThrough * (pBullet->iImpact - pBullet->iImpactReduction) / pBullet->iImpact;
02965                                                             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceChanceToGetThrough done " ));
02966                                                             return( (UINT8) iChanceToGetThrough );
02967                                                       }
02968                                                       else
02969                                                       {
02970                                                             gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop]++;
02971                                                       }
02972                                                 }
02973                                                 else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW && pBullet->qCurrZ >= qWindowBottomHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ <= qWindowTopHeight)
02974                                                 {     
02975                                                       fResolveHit = ResolveHitOnWall( pStructure, iGridNo, pBullet->bLOSIndexX, pBullet->bLOSIndexY, pBullet->ddHorizAngle );
02976 
02977                                                       if (fResolveHit)
02978                                                       {
02979                                                             // the bullet would keep on going!  unless we're considering a knife...
02980                                                             if (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE)
02981                                                             {
02982                                                                   gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop]++;
02983                                                             }
02984                                                       }
02985                                                 }
02986                                                 else if (pBullet->iLoop > CLOSE_TO_FIRER || (pStructure->fFlags & ALWAYS_CONSIDER_HIT))
02987                                                 {
02988                                                       if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF)
02989                                                       {
02990                                                             // possibly shooting at corner in which case we should let it pass
02991                                                             fResolveHit = ResolveHitOnWall( pStructure, iGridNo, pBullet->bLOSIndexX, pBullet->bLOSIndexY, pBullet->ddHorizAngle );
02992                                                       }
02993                                                       else
02994                                                       {
02995                                                             fResolveHit = TRUE;
02996                                                       }     
02997                                                       if (fResolveHit)
02998                                                       {
02999                                                             gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop]++;
03000                                                       }
03001                                                 }
03002                                           }
03003                                     }
03004                               }
03005                         }
03006 
03007                         // got past everything; go to next LOS location within
03008                         // tile, horizontally or vertically
03009                         bOldLOSIndexX = pBullet->bLOSIndexX;
03010                         bOldLOSIndexY = pBullet->bLOSIndexY;
03011                         iOldCubesZ = pBullet->iCurrCubesZ;
03012                         do
03013                         {
03014                               pBullet->qCurrX += pBullet->qIncrX;
03015                               pBullet->qCurrY += pBullet->qIncrY;
03016                               if (pRoofStructure)
03017                               {
03018                                     qLastZ = pBullet->qCurrZ;
03019                                     pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ;
03020                                     if ( (qLastZ > qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ < qWallHeight) || (qLastZ < qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ > qWallHeight))
03021                                     {           
03022                                           // hit roof!      
03023                                           //pBullet->iImpactReduction += CTGTHandleBulletStructureInteraction( pBullet, pRoofStructure );
03024                                           //if (pBullet->iImpactReduction >= pBullet->iImpact)
03025                                           {
03026                                                 //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("ChanceChanceToGetThrough done hit roof" ));
03027                                                 return( 0 );
03028                                           }
03029 
03030                                     }
03031                               }
03032                               else
03033                               {
03034                                     pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ;
03035                               }
03036                               pBullet->iLoop++;
03037                               pBullet->bLOSIndexX = CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrX ) % CELL_X_SIZE );
03038                               pBullet->bLOSIndexY = CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrY ) % CELL_Y_SIZE );
03039                               pBullet->iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ ) );
03040                         }
03041                         while( (pBullet->bLOSIndexX == bOldLOSIndexX) && (pBullet->bLOSIndexY == bOldLOSIndexY) && (pBullet->iCurrCubesZ == iOldCubesZ));
03042 
03043                         DebugLOS( String( "  CTGT at %ld %ld %ld after moving in nonempty tile from %ld %ld %ld", pBullet->bLOSIndexX, pBullet->bLOSIndexY, pBullet->iCurrCubesZ, bOldLOSIndexX, bOldLOSIndexY, iOldCubesZ ) );
03044                         pBullet->iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrX ) / CELL_X_SIZE;
03045                         pBullet->iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrY ) / CELL_Y_SIZE;
03046                   }
03047             } while( (pBullet->iLoop < pBullet->iDistanceLimit) && (pBullet->iCurrTileX == iOldTileX) && (pBullet->iCurrTileY == iOldTileY));
03048 
03049             if ( pBullet->iCurrTileX < 0 || pBullet->iCurrTileX >= WORLD_COLS || pBullet->iCurrTileY < 0 || pBullet->iCurrTileY >= WORLD_ROWS )
03050             {
03051                   //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough done invalid position"));
03052 
03053                   return( 0 );
03054             }
03055             
03056             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough check for bullet drop"));
03057             pBullet->sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( pBullet->iCurrTileY , pBullet->iCurrTileX );
03058 
03059             if (pBullet->iLoop > pBullet->iRange * 2)
03060             {
03061                   // beyond max effective range, bullet starts to drop!
03062                   // since we're doing an increment based on distance, not time, the 
03063                   // decrement is scaled down depending on how fast the bullet is (effective range)
03064                   if ( pBullet->iRange <= 0 )
03065                   {
03066                         pBullet->iRange = 1;
03067                   }
03068 
03069 
03070                   pBullet->qIncrZ -= INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( 100 ) / (pBullet->iRange * 2);
03071             }
03072 
03073             // end of the tile...
03074             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough end of tile"));
03075             if (iNumLocalStructures > 0)
03076             {
03077                   for ( iStructureLoop = 0; iStructureLoop < iNumLocalStructures; iStructureLoop++)
03078                   {
03079                         // Calculate the total impact based on the number of points in the structure that were hit
03080                         if (gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop] > 0)
03081                         {
03082                               iTotalStructureImpact = CTGTHandleBulletStructureInteraction( pBullet, gpLocalStructure[iStructureLoop] ) * gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop];
03083 
03084                               // reduce the impact reduction of a structure tile to that of the bullet, since it can't do MORE than stop it.
03085                               iTotalStructureImpact = __min( iTotalStructureImpact, pBullet->iImpact );
03086 
03087                               // add to "impact reduction" based on strength of structure weighted by probability of hitting it
03088                               pBullet->iImpactReduction += (iTotalStructureImpact * guiLocalStructureCTH[iStructureLoop]) / 100;
03089                         }
03090                   }
03091                   if (pBullet->iImpactReduction >= pBullet->iImpact)
03092                   {
03093                         //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough done impact reduced"));
03094                         return( 0 );
03095                   }
03096             }
03097       } while( pBullet->iLoop < pBullet->iDistanceLimit );
03098       // unless the distance is integral, after the loop there will be a
03099       // fractional amount of distance remaining which is unchecked
03100       // but we shouldn't(?) need to check it because the target is there!
03101 
03102       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough simple calc, %d * (%d - %d) / %d"));
03103       // try simple chance to get through, ignoring range effects
03104       iChanceToGetThrough = iChanceToGetThrough * (pBullet->iImpact - pBullet->iImpactReduction) / (max(pBullet->iImpact,1));
03105 
03106       if (iChanceToGetThrough < 0)
03107       {
03108             iChanceToGetThrough = 0;
03109       }
03110       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("CalcChanceToGetThrough done"));
03111 
03112       return( (UINT8) iChanceToGetThrough );
03113 }
03114 
03115 UINT8 SoldierToSoldierChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier )
03116 {
03117       FLOAT             dEndZPos;
03118       BOOLEAN           fOk;
03119 
03120       if (pStartSoldier == pEndSoldier)
03121       {
03122             return( 0 );
03123       }
03124       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
03125       CHECKF( pEndSoldier );
03126       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pEndSoldier, TARGET_POS, &dEndZPos );
03127       if (!fOk)
03128       {
03129             return( FALSE );
03130       }
03131 
03132       // set startsoldier's target ID ... need an ID stored in case this 
03133       // is the AI calculating cover to a location where he might not be any more
03134       pStartSoldier->ubCTGTTargetID = pEndSoldier->ubID;
03135       return( ChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, (FLOAT) CenterX( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), dEndZPos ) );
03136 }
03137 
03138 UINT8 SoldierToSoldierBodyPartChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier, UINT8 ubAimLocation )
03139 {
03140       // does like StS-CTGT but with a particular body part in mind
03141       FLOAT             dEndZPos;
03142       BOOLEAN           fOk;
03143       UINT8             ubPosType;
03144 
03145       if (pStartSoldier == pEndSoldier)
03146       {
03147             return( 0 );
03148       }
03149       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
03150       CHECKF( pEndSoldier );
03151       switch( ubAimLocation ) 
03152       {
03153             case AIM_SHOT_HEAD:
03154                   ubPosType = HEAD_TARGET_POS;
03155                   break;
03156             case AIM_SHOT_TORSO:
03157                   ubPosType = TORSO_TARGET_POS;
03158                   break;
03159             case AIM_SHOT_LEGS:
03160                   ubPosType = LEGS_TARGET_POS;
03161                   break;
03162             default:
03163                   ubPosType = TARGET_POS;
03164                   break;
03165       }
03166 
03167       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pEndSoldier, ubPosType, &dEndZPos );
03168       if (!fOk)
03169       {
03170             return( FALSE );
03171       }
03172 
03173       // set startsoldier's target ID ... need an ID stored in case this 
03174       // is the AI calculating cover to a location where he might not be any more
03175       pStartSoldier->ubCTGTTargetID = pEndSoldier->ubID;
03176       return( ChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, (FLOAT) CenterX( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), dEndZPos ) );
03177 }
03178 
03179 UINT8 SoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, INT8 bCubeLevel, UINT8 ubTargetID )
03180 {
03181       FLOAT             dEndZPos;
03182       INT16             sXPos;
03183       INT16             sYPos;
03184       INT8              bStructHeight;
03185       SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier;
03186 
03187       if (pStartSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo)
03188       {
03189             return( 0 );
03190       }
03191       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
03192 
03193       pEndSoldier = SimpleFindSoldier( sGridNo, bLevel );
03194       if (pEndSoldier != NULL)
03195       {
03196             return( SoldierToSoldierChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, pEndSoldier ) );
03197       }
03198       else
03199       {
03200             if (bCubeLevel)
03201             {
03202                   // fire at the centre of the cube specified
03203                   dEndZPos = ( ( (FLOAT) (bCubeLevel + bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) ) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
03204             }
03205             else
03206             {
03207                   bStructHeight = GetStructureTargetHeight( sGridNo, (BOOLEAN) (bLevel == 1) );
03208                   if (bStructHeight > 0)
03209                   {                             
03210                         // fire at the centre of the cube of the tallest structure              
03211                         dEndZPos = ((FLOAT) (bStructHeight + bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
03212                   }
03213                   else
03214                   {
03215                         // fire at 1 unit above the level of the ground
03216                         dEndZPos = (FLOAT) ((bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX + 1);
03217                   }
03218             }
03219 
03220             dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].sHeight );
03221             ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
03222             sXPos = sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
03223             sYPos = sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
03224 
03225             // set startsoldier's target ID ... need an ID stored in case this 
03226             // is the AI calculating cover to a location where he might not be any more
03227             pStartSoldier->ubCTGTTargetID = ubTargetID;
03228             return( ChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, (FLOAT) sXPos, (FLOAT) sYPos, dEndZPos ) );
03229       }
03230 }
03231 
03232 UINT8 AISoldierToSoldierChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier )
03233 {
03234       // Like a standard CTGT algorithm BUT fakes the start soldier at standing height
03235       FLOAT             dEndZPos;
03236       BOOLEAN           fOk;
03237       UINT8             ubChance;
03238       UINT16            usTrueState;
03239 
03240       if (pStartSoldier == pEndSoldier)
03241       {
03242             return( 0 );
03243       }
03244       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
03245       CHECKF( pEndSoldier );
03246       fOk = CalculateSoldierZPos( pEndSoldier, TARGET_POS, &dEndZPos );
03247       if (!fOk)
03248       {
03249             return( FALSE );
03250       }
03251       usTrueState = pStartSoldier->usAnimState;
03252       pStartSoldier->usAnimState = STANDING;
03253 
03254       // set startsoldier's target ID ... need an ID stored in case this 
03255       // is the AI calculating cover to a location where he might not be any more
03256       pStartSoldier->ubCTGTTargetID = NOBODY;
03257 
03258       ubChance = ChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, (FLOAT) CenterX( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), (FLOAT) CenterY( pEndSoldier->sGridNo ), dEndZPos );
03259       pStartSoldier->usAnimState = usTrueState;
03260       return( ubChance );
03261 }
03262 
03263 UINT8 AISoldierToLocationChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE * pStartSoldier, INT16 sGridNo, INT8 bLevel, INT8 bCubeLevel )
03264 {
03265       FLOAT             dEndZPos;
03266       INT16             sXPos;
03267       INT16             sYPos;
03268       INT8              bStructHeight;
03269       SOLDIERTYPE * pEndSoldier;
03270 
03271       UINT16            usTrueState;
03272       UINT8             ubChance;
03273 
03274       if (pStartSoldier->sGridNo == sGridNo)
03275       {
03276             return( 0 );
03277       }
03278       CHECKF( pStartSoldier );
03279 
03280       pEndSoldier = SimpleFindSoldier( sGridNo, bLevel );
