03281       if (pEndSoldier != NULL)
03282       {
03283             return( AISoldierToSoldierChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, pEndSoldier ) );
03284       }
03285       else
03286       {
03287             if (bCubeLevel)
03288             {
03289                   // fire at the centre of the cube specified
03290                   dEndZPos = ( (FLOAT) (bCubeLevel + bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
03291             }
03292             else
03293             {
03294                   bStructHeight = GetStructureTargetHeight( sGridNo, (BOOLEAN) (bLevel == 1) );
03295                   if (bStructHeight > 0)
03296                   {                             
03297                         // fire at the centre of the cube of the tallest structure              
03298                         dEndZPos = ((FLOAT) (bStructHeight + bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) - 0.5f) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX;
03299                   }
03300                   else
03301                   {
03302                         // fire at 1 unit above the level of the ground
03303                         dEndZPos = (FLOAT) ((bLevel * PROFILE_Z_SIZE) * HEIGHT_UNITS_PER_INDEX + 1);
03304                   }
03305             }
03306 
03307             dEndZPos += CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[sGridNo].sHeight );
03308             ConvertGridNoToXY( sGridNo, &sXPos, &sYPos );
03309             sXPos = sXPos * CELL_X_SIZE + (CELL_X_SIZE / 2);
03310             sYPos = sYPos * CELL_Y_SIZE + (CELL_Y_SIZE / 2);
03311 
03312             // set startsoldier's target ID ... need an ID stored in case this 
03313             // is the AI calculating cover to a location where he might not be any more
03314             pStartSoldier->ubCTGTTargetID = NOBODY;
03315 
03316             usTrueState = pStartSoldier->usAnimState;
03317             pStartSoldier->usAnimState = STANDING;
03318 
03319             ubChance = ChanceToGetThrough( pStartSoldier, (FLOAT) sXPos, (FLOAT) sYPos, dEndZPos );
03320 
03321             pStartSoldier->usAnimState = usTrueState;
03322 
03323             return( ubChance );
03324       }
03325 }
03326 
03327 
03328 void CalculateFiringIncrements( DOUBLE ddHorizAngle, DOUBLE ddVerticAngle, DOUBLE dd2DDistance, BULLET * pBullet, DOUBLE * pddNewHorizAngle, DOUBLE * pddNewVerticAngle )
03329 {
03330       INT32 iMissedBy = - pBullet->sHitBy;
03331       DOUBLE ddVerticPercentOfMiss;
03332       DOUBLE ddAbsVerticAngle;
03333       DOUBLE ddScrewupAdjustmentLimit;
03334       UINT32 uiChanceOfMissAbove;
03335       DOUBLE ddMinimumMiss;
03336       DOUBLE ddMaximumMiss;
03337       DOUBLE ddAmountOfMiss;
03338 
03339       if (iMissedBy > 0)
03340       {
03341             ddVerticPercentOfMiss = PreRandom( 50 );
03342 
03343             ddAbsVerticAngle = ddVerticAngle;
03344             if (ddAbsVerticAngle < 0)
03345             {
03346                   ddAbsVerticAngle *= -1.0;
03347             }
03348 
03349             // chance of shooting over target is 60 for horizontal shots, up to 80% for shots at 22.5 degrees,
03350             // and then down again to 50% for shots at 45+%.
03351             if (ddAbsVerticAngle < DEGREES_22_5)
03352             {
03353                   uiChanceOfMissAbove = 60 + (INT32) (20 * (ddAbsVerticAngle) / DEGREES_22_5);
03354             }
03355             else if (ddAbsVerticAngle < DEGREES_45)
03356             {
03357                   uiChanceOfMissAbove = 80 - (INT32) (30.0 * (ddAbsVerticAngle - DEGREES_22_5) / DEGREES_22_5);
03358             }
03359             else
03360             {
03361                   uiChanceOfMissAbove = 50;
03362             }
03363             // figure out change in horizontal and vertical angle due to shooter screwup
03364             // the more the screwup, the greater the angle;
03365             // for the look of things, the further away, reduce the angle a bit.
03366             ddScrewupAdjustmentLimit = (dd2DDistance / CELL_X_SIZE) / 200;
03367             if (ddScrewupAdjustmentLimit > MAX_AIMING_SCREWUP / 2)
03368             {
03369                   ddScrewupAdjustmentLimit = MAX_AIMING_SCREWUP / 2;
03370             }
03371             ddMaximumMiss = MAX_AIMING_SCREWUP - ddScrewupAdjustmentLimit;
03372 
03373             // Want to make sure that not too many misses actually hit the target after all
03374             // to miss a target at 1 tile is about 30 degrees off, at 5 tiles, 6 degrees off
03375             // at 15 tiles, 2 degrees off.  Thus 30 degrees divided by the # of tiles distance.
03376             ddMinimumMiss = MIN_AIMING_SCREWUP / (dd2DDistance / CELL_X_SIZE );
03377             
03378             if (ddMinimumMiss > ddMaximumMiss)
03379             {
03380                   ddMinimumMiss = ddMaximumMiss;
03381             }
03382 
03383             ddAmountOfMiss = ( (ddMaximumMiss - ddMinimumMiss) * (DOUBLE) iMissedBy) / 100.0 + ddMinimumMiss;
03384 
03385             // miss to the left or right
03386             if (PreRandom( 2 ) )
03387             {
03388                   ddHorizAngle += ddAmountOfMiss * (100.0 - ddVerticPercentOfMiss) / 100.0;
03389             }
03390             else
03391             {
03392                   ddHorizAngle -= ddAmountOfMiss * (100.0 - ddVerticPercentOfMiss) / 100.0;
03393             }
03394 
03395             // miss up or down
03396             if (PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceOfMissAbove)
03397             {
03398                   ddVerticAngle += ddAmountOfMiss * ddVerticPercentOfMiss / 100.0;
03399             }
03400             else
03401             {
03402                   ddVerticAngle -= ddAmountOfMiss * ddVerticPercentOfMiss / 100.0;
03403             }
03404       }
03405 
03406       *pddNewHorizAngle = ddHorizAngle;
03407       *pddNewVerticAngle = ddVerticAngle;
03408 
03409       pBullet->qIncrX = FloatToFixed( (FLOAT) cos( ddHorizAngle ) );
03410       pBullet->qIncrY = FloatToFixed( (FLOAT) sin( ddHorizAngle ) );
03411       
03412       // this is the same as multiplying the X and Y increments by the projection of the line in
03413       // 3-space onto the horizontal plane, without reducing the X/Y increments and thus slowing
03414       // the LOS code
03415       pBullet->qIncrZ = FloatToFixed( (FLOAT) ( sin( ddVerticAngle ) / sin( (PI/2) - ddVerticAngle ) * 2.56 ) );
03416 }
03417 
03418 INT8 FireBullet( SOLDIERTYPE * pFirer, BULLET * pBullet, BOOLEAN fFake )
03419 {
03420       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBullet"));
03421 
03422       pBullet->iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrX ) / CELL_X_SIZE;
03423       pBullet->iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrY ) / CELL_Y_SIZE;
03424       pBullet->bLOSIndexX = CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrX ) % CELL_X_SIZE );
03425       pBullet->bLOSIndexY = CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrY ) % CELL_Y_SIZE );
03426       pBullet->iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ ) );
03427       pBullet->iLoop = 1;
03428       pBullet->pFirer = pFirer;
03429       pBullet->iImpactReduction = 0;
03430       pBullet->sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( pBullet->iCurrTileY, pBullet->iCurrTileX );
03431 
03432       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBullet: bullet info set"));
03433 
03434       if (fFake)
03435       {
03436             pBullet->ubTargetID = pFirer->ubCTGTTargetID;
03437             return( CalcChanceToGetThrough( pBullet ) );
03438       }
03439       else
03440       {
03441             pBullet->ubTargetID = pFirer->ubTargetID;
03442             //if ( gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_HIDE_BULLETS ] )
03443             //{
03444             //    pBullet->uiLastUpdate = 0;
03445             //    pBullet->ubTilesPerUpdate     = 4;
03446             //}
03447             //else
03448             //{
03449                   pBullet->uiLastUpdate = 0;
03450                   pBullet->ubTilesPerUpdate     = 1;
03451             //}
03452 
03453             // increment shots fired if shooter has a merc profile
03454         if( ( pFirer->ubProfile != NO_PROFILE ) && ( pFirer->bTeam == 0 ) )
03455             {
03456               // another shot fired
03457               gMercProfiles[ pFirer->ubProfile ].usShotsFired++;
03458             }
03459 
03460             if ( Item[ pFirer->usAttackingWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
03461             {
03462                   pBullet->usClockTicksPerUpdate = 30;
03463             }
03464             else
03465             {
03466                   pBullet->usClockTicksPerUpdate = (Weapon[ pFirer->usAttackingWeapon ].ubBulletSpeed + GetBulletSpeedBonus(&pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand]) ) / 10;
03467             }
03468 
03469             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBullet: handle flags"));
03470             HandleBulletSpecialFlags( pBullet->iBullet );
03471 
03472             //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBullet: move bullet"));
03473             MoveBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
03474 
03475           //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBullet done"));
03476 
03477             return( TRUE );
03478       }
03479 }
03480 
03481 /*
03482 DOUBLE CalculateVerticalAngle( SOLDIERTYPE * pFirer, SOLDIERTYPE * pTarget )
03483 {
03484       DOUBLE dStartZ, dEndZ;
03485 
03486       CalculateSoldierZPos( pFirer, FIRING_POS, &dStartZ );
03487       CalculateSoldierZPos( pTarget, TARGET_POS, &dEndZ );
03488 
03489       dDeltaX = (FLOAT) CenterX( pTarget->sGridNo ) - (FLOAT) CenterX( pFirer->sGridNo );
03490       dDeltaY = (FLOAT) CenterY( pTarget->sGridNo ) - (FLOAT) CenterY( pFirer->sGridNo );
03491       dDeltaZ = dEndZ - dStartZ;
03492 
03493       d2DDistance = Distance2D( dDeltaX, dDeltaY );
03494 
03495       ddOrigHorizAngle = atan2( dDeltaY, dDeltaX );   
03496 }
03497 */
03498 
03499 
03500 INT8 FireBulletGivenTarget( SOLDIERTYPE * pFirer, FLOAT dEndX, FLOAT dEndY, FLOAT dEndZ, UINT16 usHandItem, INT16 sHitBy, BOOLEAN fBuckshot, BOOLEAN fFake )
03501 {
03502       //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"FireBulletGivenTarget");
03503       // fFake indicates that we should set things up for a call to ChanceToGetThrough
03504       FLOAT       dStartZ;
03505 
03506       FLOAT       d2DDistance;
03507       FLOAT       dDeltaX;
03508       FLOAT       dDeltaY;
03509       FLOAT       dDeltaZ;
03510 
03511       FLOAT       dStartX;
03512       FLOAT       dStartY;
03513 
03514       DOUBLE      ddOrigHorizAngle;
03515       DOUBLE      ddOrigVerticAngle;
03516       DOUBLE      ddHorizAngle;
03517       DOUBLE      ddVerticAngle;
03518       DOUBLE      ddAdjustedHorizAngle;
03519       DOUBLE      ddAdjustedVerticAngle;
03520       DOUBLE      ddDummyHorizAngle;
03521       DOUBLE      ddDummyVerticAngle;
03522 
03523       BULLET *                      pBullet;
03524       INT32                               iBullet;
03525 
03526       INT32       iDistance;
03527 
03528       UINT8       ubLoop;
03529       UINT8       ubShots;
03530       UINT8       ubImpact;
03531       INT8        bCTGT;
03532       UINT8       ubSpreadIndex = 0;
03533       UINT16      usBulletFlags = 0;
03534 
03535        //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBulletGivenTarget"));
03536 
03537       CalculateSoldierZPos( pFirer, FIRING_POS, &dStartZ );
03538 
03539       dStartX = (FLOAT) CenterX( pFirer->sGridNo );
03540       dStartY = (FLOAT) CenterY( pFirer->sGridNo );
03541 
03542       dDeltaX = dEndX - dStartX;
03543       dDeltaY = dEndY - dStartY;
03544       dDeltaZ = dEndZ - dStartZ;
03545 
03546       //lal bugfix
03547       if( dDeltaZ > 0 )
03548             d2DDistance = Distance3D( dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dDeltaZ );
03549       else
03550             d2DDistance = Distance2D( dDeltaX, dDeltaY );
03551 
03552       //d2DDistance = Distance2D( dDeltaX, dDeltaY );
03553       
03554       iDistance = (INT32) d2DDistance;
03555 
03556       if ( d2DDistance != iDistance )
03557       {
03558             iDistance += 1;
03559             d2DDistance = (FLOAT) ( iDistance);
03560       }
03561 
03562       ddOrigHorizAngle = atan2( dDeltaY, dDeltaX );   
03563       ddOrigVerticAngle = atan2( dDeltaZ, (d2DDistance * 2.56f) );
03564 
03565       ubShots = 1;
03566 
03567       // Check if we have spit as a weapon!
03568       if ( Weapon[ usHandItem ].ubWeaponClass == MONSTERCLASS )
03569       {
03570             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT;
03571       }
03572       else if ( Item[ usHandItem ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE )
03573       {
03574             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE;
03575       }
03576       else if (  Item[usHandItem].rocketlauncher )
03577       {
03578             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE;
03579       }
03580       else if ( Item[usHandItem].cannon )
03581       {
03582             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON;
03583       }
03584       else if ( Item[usHandItem].rocketrifle )
03585       {
03586             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE;
03587       }
03588       else if ( usHandItem == FLAMETHROWER )
03589       {
03590             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_FLAME;
03591             ubSpreadIndex = 2;
03592       }
03593       else if ( AmmoTypes[ pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType ].tracerEffect && (pFirer->bDoBurst || gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_TRACERS_FOR_SINGLE_FIRE ]) )
03594       {
03595             usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_TRACER;
03596       }
03597 
03598       ubImpact =(UINT8) GetDamage(&pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand]);
03599 //    if (!fFake)
03600       {
03601             if (fBuckshot)
03602             {
03603                   // shotgun pellets fire 9 bullets doing 1/4 damage each
03604                   if (!fFake)
03605                   {
03606                         ubShots = AmmoTypes[pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType].numberOfBullets;
03607                         // but you can't really aim the damn things very well!
03608                         if (sHitBy > 0)
03609                         {
03610                               sHitBy = sHitBy / 2;
03611                         }
03612                         if ( IsDuckbill( &(pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand])) )
03613                         {
03614                               ubSpreadIndex = 1;
03615                         }
03616                         if (pFirer->ubTargetID != NOBODY)
03617                         {
03618                               MercPtrs[ pFirer->ubTargetID ]->bNumPelletsHitBy = 0;
03619                         }
03620                         usBulletFlags |= BULLET_FLAG_BUCKSHOT;
03621 
03622                   }
03623 //                ubImpact = AMMO_DAMAGE_ADJUSTMENT_BUCKSHOT( ubImpact );
03624                   ubImpact = (UINT8) (ubImpact * AmmoTypes[pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType].multipleBulletDamageMultiplier / max(1,AmmoTypes[pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].ubGunAmmoType].multipleBulletDamageDivisor) );
03625             }
03626       }
03627 
03628       // GET BULLET
03629       for (ubLoop = 0; ubLoop < ubShots; ubLoop++)
03630       {
03631             iBullet = CreateBullet( pFirer->ubID, fFake, usBulletFlags,usHandItem );
03632             if (iBullet == -1)
03633             {
03634                   //DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Failed to create bullet") );
03635 
03636                   return( FALSE );
03637             }
03638             pBullet = GetBulletPtr( iBullet );
03639             pBullet->sHitBy   = sHitBy;
03640 
03641             if (dStartZ < WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS)
03642             {
03643                   if (dEndZ > WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS)
03644                   {
03645                         pBullet->fCheckForRoof = TRUE;
03646                   }
03647                   else
03648                   {
03649                         pBullet->fCheckForRoof = FALSE;
03650                   }
03651             }
03652             else // dStartZ >= WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS; presumably >
03653             {
03654                   if (dEndZ < WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS)
03655                   {
03656                         pBullet->fCheckForRoof = TRUE;
03657                   }
03658                   else
03659                   {
03660                         pBullet->fCheckForRoof = FALSE;
03661                   }
03662             }
03663 
03664             if ( ubLoop == 0 )
03665             {                 
03666                   ddHorizAngle = ddOrigHorizAngle;
03667                   ddVerticAngle = ddOrigVerticAngle;
03668 
03669                   // first bullet, roll to hit...
03670                   if ( sHitBy >= 0 )
03671                   {
03672                         // calculate by hand (well, without angles) to match LOS
03673                         pBullet->qIncrX = FloatToFixed( dDeltaX / (FLOAT)iDistance );
03674                         pBullet->qIncrY = FloatToFixed( dDeltaY / (FLOAT)iDistance );
03675                         pBullet->qIncrZ = FloatToFixed( dDeltaZ / (FLOAT)iDistance );
03676                         ddAdjustedHorizAngle = ddHorizAngle;
03677                         ddAdjustedVerticAngle = ddVerticAngle;
03678                   }
03679                   else
03680                   {
03681                         CalculateFiringIncrements( ddHorizAngle, ddVerticAngle, d2DDistance, pBullet, &ddAdjustedHorizAngle, &ddAdjustedVerticAngle );
03682                   }
03683             }
03684             else
03685             {
03686                   // temporarily set bullet's sHitBy value to 0 to get unadjusted angles
03687                   pBullet->sHitBy = 0;
03688                   
03689                   ddHorizAngle = ddAdjustedHorizAngle + ddShotgunSpread[ubSpreadIndex][ubLoop][0];
03690                   ddVerticAngle = ddAdjustedVerticAngle + ddShotgunSpread[ubSpreadIndex][ubLoop][1];
03691 
03692                   CalculateFiringIncrements( ddHorizAngle, ddVerticAngle, d2DDistance, pBullet, &ddDummyHorizAngle, &ddDummyVerticAngle );
03693                   pBullet->sHitBy = sHitBy;
03694             }
03695 
03696 
03697             pBullet->ddHorizAngle = ddHorizAngle;
03698 
03699             if (ubLoop == 0 && pFirer->bDoBurst < 2)
03700             {
03701                   pBullet->fAimed = TRUE;
03702             }
03703             else
03704             {
03705                   // buckshot pellets after the first can hit friendlies even at close range
03706                   pBullet->fAimed = FALSE;
03707             }
03708 
03709             if ( pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE )
03710             {
03711                   pBullet->ubItemStatus = pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand].bStatus[0];
03712             }
03713 
03714             // apply increments for first move
03715 
03716             pBullet->qCurrX = FloatToFixed( dStartX ) + pBullet->qIncrX;
03717             pBullet->qCurrY = FloatToFixed( dStartY ) + pBullet->qIncrY;
03718             pBullet->qCurrZ = FloatToFixed( dStartZ ) + pBullet->qIncrZ;
03719 
03720             // NB we can only apply correction for leftovers if the bullet is going to hit
03721             // because otherwise the increments are not right for the calculations!
03722             if ( pBullet->sHitBy >= 0 )
03723             {
03724                   pBullet->qCurrX += ( FloatToFixed( dDeltaX ) - pBullet->qIncrX * iDistance ) / 2;
03725                   pBullet->qCurrY += ( FloatToFixed( dDeltaY ) - pBullet->qIncrY * iDistance ) / 2;
03726                   pBullet->qCurrZ += ( FloatToFixed( dDeltaZ ) - pBullet->qIncrZ * iDistance ) / 2;
03727             }
03728             
03729             pBullet->iImpact = ubImpact;
03730       
03731             pBullet->iRange = GunRange( &(pFirer->inv[pFirer->ubAttackingHand]) );
03732             pBullet->sTargetGridNo = ((INT32)dEndX) / CELL_X_SIZE + ((INT32)dEndY) / CELL_Y_SIZE * WORLD_COLS;
03733 
03734             pBullet->bStartCubesAboveLevelZ = (INT8) CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( (INT32)dStartZ - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ pFirer->sGridNo ].sHeight ) );
03735             pBullet->bEndCubesAboveLevelZ = (INT8) CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( (INT32)dEndZ - CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( gpWorldLevelData[ pBullet->sTargetGridNo ].sHeight ) );
03736 
03737             // this distance limit only applies in a "hard" sense to fake bullets for chance-to-get-through,
03738             // but is used for determining structure hits by the regular code
03739             pBullet->iDistanceLimit = iDistance;
03740             if (fFake)
03741             {
03742                   bCTGT = FireBullet( pFirer, pBullet, TRUE );
03743                   RemoveBullet( iBullet );
03744                   return( bCTGT );
03745             }
03746             else
03747             {
03748                   if (ubLoop + 1 > pFirer->bBulletsLeft)
03749                   {
03750                         // this is an error!!
03751                         ubLoop = ubLoop;
03752                   }
03753                   FireBullet( pFirer, pBullet, FALSE );
03754             }
03755       }
03756 
03757        //DebugMsg(TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,String("FireBulletGivenTargetDone"));
03758 
03759       return( TRUE );
03760 }
03761 
03762 INT8 ChanceToGetThrough( SOLDIERTYPE * pFirer, FLOAT dEndX, FLOAT dEndY, FLOAT dEndZ )
03763 {
03764       if ( Item[pFirer->usAttackingWeapon].usItemClass == IC_GUN || Item[ pFirer->usAttackingWeapon ].usItemClass == IC_THROWING_KNIFE || Item[pFirer->usAttackingWeapon].rocketlauncher )
03765       {
03766             BOOLEAN fBuckShot = FALSE;
03767 
03768             // if shotgun, shotgun would have to be in main hand
03769             if ( pFirer->inv[ HANDPOS ].usItem == pFirer->usAttackingWeapon )
03770             {
03771                   if ( AmmoTypes[pFirer->inv[ HANDPOS ].ubGunAmmoType].numberOfBullets > 1 )
03772                   {
03773                         fBuckShot = TRUE;
03774                   }
03775             }
03776 
03777             return( FireBulletGivenTarget( pFirer, dEndX, dEndY, dEndZ, pFirer->usAttackingWeapon, 0, fBuckShot, TRUE ) );
03778       }
03779       else
03780       {
03781             // fake it
03782             return( FireBulletGivenTarget( pFirer, dEndX, dEndY, dEndZ, GLOCK_17, 0, FALSE, TRUE ));
03783       }
03784 }
03785 
03786 void MoveBullet( INT32 iBullet )
03787 {
03788       BULLET      *pBullet;
03789 
03790       FIXEDPT     qLandHeight;
03791       INT32       iCurrAboveLevelZ;
03792       INT32       iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ;
03793       INT16       sDesiredLevel;
03794 
03795       INT32       iOldTileX;
03796       INT32       iOldTileY;
03797       INT32       iOldCubesZ;
03798 
03799       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
03800       STRUCTURE *             pStructure;
03801       STRUCTURE *             pRoofStructure = NULL;
03802 
03803       FIXEDPT                             qLastZ;
03804 
03805       SOLDIERTYPE *           pTarget;
03806       UINT8                               ubTargetID;
03807       BOOLEAN                             fIntended;
03808       BOOLEAN                             fStopped;
03809       INT8                                bOldLOSIndexX;
03810       INT8                                bOldLOSIndexY;
03811 
03812       UINT32                              uiTileInc = 0;
03813       UINT32                              uiTime;
03814 
03815       INT8                                bDir;
03816       INT32                               iGridNo, iAdjGridNo;
03817 
03818       INT32                               iRemainingImpact;
03819 
03820       FIXEDPT                             qDistToTravelX;
03821       FIXEDPT                             qDistToTravelY;
03822       INT32                               iStepsToTravelX;
03823       INT32                               iStepsToTravelY;
03824       INT32                               iStepsToTravel;
03825 
03826       INT32                               iNumLocalStructures;
03827       INT32                               iStructureLoop;
03828       UINT32                              uiChanceOfHit;
03829 
03830       BOOLEAN                             fResolveHit;
03831 
03832       INT32                               i;
03833       BOOLEAN                             fGoingOver = FALSE;
03834       BOOLEAN                             fHitStructure;
03835 
03836       FIXEDPT                             qWallHeight;
03837       FIXEDPT                             qWindowBottomHeight;
03838       FIXEDPT                             qWindowTopHeight;
03839 
03840       pBullet = GetBulletPtr( iBullet );
03841 
03842       // CHECK MIN TIME ELAPSED
03843       uiTime = GetJA2Clock( );
03844 
03845       if ( ( uiTime - pBullet->uiLastUpdate ) < pBullet->usClockTicksPerUpdate )
03846       {
03847             return;
03848       }
03849 
03850       pBullet->uiLastUpdate = uiTime;
03851       
03852       do
03853       {
03854             // check a particular tile
03855             // retrieve values from world for this particular tile
03856             iGridNo = pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS;
03857             if (!GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16) iGridNo ) || (pBullet->iCurrCubesZ > PROFILE_Z_SIZE * 2 && FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qIncrZ ) > 0 ) )
03858             {
03859                   // bullet outside of world!
03860                   // NB remove bullet only flags a bullet for deletion; we still have access to the 
03861                   // information in the structure
03862                   RemoveBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
03863                   BulletMissed( pBullet, pBullet->pFirer );
03864                   return;
03865             }
03866 
03867             pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[ iGridNo ]);
03868             qLandHeight = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( pMapElement->sHeight ) );
03869             qWallHeight = gqStandardWallHeight + qLandHeight;
03870             qWindowBottomHeight = gqStandardWindowBottomHeight + qLandHeight;
03871             qWindowTopHeight = gqStandardWindowTopHeight + qLandHeight;
03872 
03873 
03874             // calculate which level bullet is on for suppression and close call purposes
03875             // figure out the LOS cube level of the current point
03876             iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ - qLandHeight) );
03877             // figure out the level
03878             if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX) 
03879             {
03880                   // check objects on the ground
03881                   sDesiredLevel = 0;
03882             }
03883             else
03884             {
03885                   // check objects on roofs
03886                   sDesiredLevel = 1;
03887             }
03888 
03889             // assemble list of structures we might hit!
03890             iNumLocalStructures = 0;
03891             pStructure = pMapElement->pStructureHead;
03892             // calculate chance of hitting each structure
03893             uiChanceOfHit = ChanceOfBulletHittingStructure( pBullet->iLoop, pBullet->iDistanceLimit, pBullet->sHitBy );
03894             if (iGridNo == (INT32) pBullet->sTargetGridNo)
03895             {
03896                   fIntended = TRUE;
03897                   // if in the same tile as our destination, we WANT to hit the structure!
03898                   if ( fIntended )
03899                   {
03900                         uiChanceOfHit = 100;
03901                   }
03902             }
03903             else
03904             {
03905                   fIntended = FALSE;
03906             }
03907 
03908             while( pStructure )
03909             {
03910                   if (pStructure->fFlags & ALWAYS_CONSIDER_HIT)
03911                   {
03912                         // ALWAYS add walls
03913                         // fence is special
03914                         if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ANYFENCE )
03915                         {
03916                               // If the density of the fence is less than 100%, or this is the top of the fence, then roll the dice
03917                               // NB cubes are 0 based, heights 1 based
03918                               if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity < 100 )
03919                               {
03920                                     // requires roll
03921                                     if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceOfHit )
03922                                     {
03923                                           gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
03924                                           gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
03925                                           iNumLocalStructures++;
03926                                     }
03927                               }
03928                               else if ( (pBullet->iLoop <= CLOSE_TO_FIRER) && (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= pBullet->bStartCubesAboveLevelZ) && (pBullet->bEndCubesAboveLevelZ >= iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ) && iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ == (StructureHeight( pStructure ) - 1) )
03929                               {
03930                                     // near firer and at top of structure and at same level as bullet's start
03931                                     // requires roll
03932                                     if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceOfHit )
03933                                     {
03934                                           gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
03935                                           gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
03936                                           iNumLocalStructures++;
03937                                     }
03938                               }
03939                               else if ( (pBullet->iLoop + pBullet->iDistanceLimit / 50 >= pBullet->iDistanceLimit - CLOSE_TO_FIRER) && (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ <= pBullet->bEndCubesAboveLevelZ) && iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ == (StructureHeight( pStructure ) - 1) )
03940                               {
03941                                     // near target and at top of structure and at same level as bullet's end
03942                                     // requires roll
03943                                     if ( PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceOfHit )
03944                                     {
03945                                           gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
03946                                           gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
03947                                           iNumLocalStructures++;
03948                                     }
03949                               }
03950                               else
03951                               {
03952                                     // always add
03953                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
03954                                     gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
03955                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
03956                               }
03957 
03958                               /*
03959                               if ( !( (pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubDensity < 100 || iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ == (StructureHeight( pStructure ) - 1) )     ) && (PreRandom( 100 ) >= uiChanceOfHit) )
03960                               {
03961                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
03962                                     gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
03963                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
03964                               }
03965                               */
03966                         }
03967                         else
03968                         {
03969                               gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
03970                               gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
03971                               iNumLocalStructures++;
03972                         }                 
03973                   }
03974                   else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ROOF)
03975                   {
03976                         // only consider roofs if the flag is set; don't add them to the array since they
03977                         // are a special case
03978                         if (pBullet->fCheckForRoof)
03979                         {
03980                               pRoofStructure = pStructure;
03981 
03982                               qLastZ = pBullet->qCurrZ - pBullet->qIncrZ;
03983 
03984                               // if just on going to next tile we cross boundary, then roof stops bullet here!
03985                               if ( (qLastZ > qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ <= qWallHeight) || (qLastZ < qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ >= qWallHeight))
03986                               {
03987                                     // hit a roof
03988                                     StopBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
03989                                     BulletHitStructure( pBullet, 0, 0, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, TRUE );                                        
03990                                     return;
03991                               }
03992 
03993                         }
03994                   }
03995                   else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PERSON)
03996                   {
03997                         if ( MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ] != pBullet->pFirer )
03998                         {
03999                               // in actually moving the bullet, we consider only count friends as targets if the bullet is unaimed
04000                               // (buckshot), if they are the intended target, or beyond the range of automatic friendly fire hits
04001                               // OR a 1 in 30 chance occurs
04002 
04003 
04004                               // ignore *intervening* target if not visible; PCs are always visible so AI will never skip them on that
04005                               // basis
04006                               if (fIntended)
04007                               {
04008                                     // could hit this person!
04009                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
04010                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
04011                               }
04012                               else if ( pBullet->pFirer->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER )
04013                               {
04014                                     // monsters firing will always accidentally hit people but never accidentally hit each other.
04015                                     if ( !(MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_MONSTER) )
04016                                     {
04017                                           gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
04018                                           iNumLocalStructures++;
04019                                     }
04020                               }
04021                               else if ( MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->bVisible == TRUE &&
04022                                                             gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[pStructure->usStructureID]->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight == ANIM_STAND &&
04023                                                             ( (pBullet->fAimed && pBullet->iLoop > MIN_DIST_FOR_HIT_FRIENDS) ||
04024                                                                   (!pBullet->fAimed && pBullet->iLoop > MIN_DIST_FOR_HIT_FRIENDS_UNAIMED) ||
04025                                                                   PreRandom( 100 ) < MIN_CHANCE_TO_ACCIDENTALLY_HIT_SOMEONE 
04026                                                             )
04027                                                       )
04028                               {
04029                                     // could hit this person!
04030                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
04031                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
04032                               }
04033 
04034                               // this might be a close call
04035                               if ( MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pBullet->pFirer->bTeam != gbPlayerNum && sDesiredLevel == MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->bLevel )
04036                               {
04037                                     MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->fCloseCall = TRUE;                                       
04038                               }
04039 
04040                               if ( IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( MercPtrs[pStructure->usStructureID] ) )
04041                               {
04042                                     // apply suppression, regardless of friendly or enemy
04043                                     // except if friendly, not within a few tiles of shooter
04044                                     if ( MercPtrs[ pStructure->usStructureID ]->bSide != pBullet->pFirer->bSide || pBullet->iLoop > MIN_DIST_FOR_HIT_FRIENDS )
04045                                     {
04046                                           // buckshot has only a 1 in 2 chance of applying a suppression point
04047                                           if ( !(pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_BUCKSHOT) || Random( 2 ) )
04048                                           {
04049                                                 // bullet goes whizzing by this guy!
04050                                                 switch ( gAnimControl[ MercPtrs[pStructure->usStructureID]->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04051                                                 {
04052                                                       case ANIM_PRONE:
04053                                                             // two 1/4 chances of avoiding suppression pt - one below
04054                                                             if (PreRandom( 4 ) == 0)
04055                                                             {
04056                                                                   break;
04057                                                             }
04058                                                             // else fall through
04059                                                       case ANIM_CROUCH:
04060                                                             // 1/4 chance of avoiding suppression pt
04061                                                             if (PreRandom( 4 ) == 0)
04062                                                             {
04063                                                                   break;
04064                                                             }
04065                                                             // else fall through
04066                                                       default:
04067                                                             MercPtrs[pStructure->usStructureID]->ubSuppressionPoints++;
04068                                                             MercPtrs[pStructure->usStructureID]->ubSuppressorID = pBullet->pFirer->ubID;
04069                                                             break;
04070                                                 }
04071                                           }
04072                                     }                             
04073                               }
04074                         }
04075 
04076                   }
04077                   else if ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CORPSE )
04078                   {
04079                         if ( iGridNo == (INT32) pBullet->sTargetGridNo || (pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubNumberOfTiles >= 10) )
04080                         {
04081                               // could hit this corpse!
04082                               // but ignore if someone is here
04083                               if ( FindStructure( (INT16) iGridNo, STRUCTURE_PERSON ) == NULL )
04084                               {
04085                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
04086                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
04087                               }
04088                         }
04089                   }
04090                   else
04091                   {
04092                         if (pBullet->iLoop > CLOSE_TO_FIRER || ( fIntended ) )
04093                         {
04094                               // calculate chance of hitting structure 
04095                               if (PreRandom( 100 ) < uiChanceOfHit)
04096                               {
04097                                     // could hit it
04098                                     gpLocalStructure[iNumLocalStructures] = pStructure;
04099                                     gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iNumLocalStructures] = 0;
04100                                     iNumLocalStructures++;
04101                               }
04102                         }
04103                   }
04104                   pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
04105             }
04106 
04107             // check to see if any soldiers are nearby; those soldiers
04108             // have their near-miss value incremented
04109             if (pMapElement->ubAdjacentSoldierCnt > 0)
04110             {
04111                   // cube level now calculated above!
04112                   // figure out the LOS cube level of the current point
04113                   //iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ - qLandHeight) );
04114                   // figure out what level to affect...
04115                   if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF_MAX)
04116                   {
04117                         /*
04118                         if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX) 
04119                         {
04120                               // check objects on the ground
04121                               sDesiredLevel = 0;
04122                         }
04123                         else
04124                         {
04125                               // check objects on roofs
04126                               sDesiredLevel = 1;
04127                         }
04128                         */
04129 
04130                         for( bDir = 0; bDir < NUM_WORLD_DIRECTIONS; bDir++)
04131                         {
04132                               iAdjGridNo = iGridNo + DirIncrementer[bDir];
04133 
04134                               if ( gubWorldMovementCosts[ iAdjGridNo ][ sDesiredLevel ][ bDir ] < TRAVELCOST_BLOCKED)
04135                               {
04136                                     ubTargetID = WhoIsThere2( (INT16) iAdjGridNo, (INT8) sDesiredLevel );
04137                                     if (ubTargetID != NOBODY)
04138                                     {
04139                                           pTarget = MercPtrs[ ubTargetID ];
04140                                           if ( IS_MERC_BODY_TYPE( pTarget ) && pBullet->pFirer->bSide != pTarget->bSide )
04141                                           {
04142                                                 if ( !(pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_BUCKSHOT) || Random( 2 ) )
04143                                                 {
04144                                                       // bullet goes whizzing by this guy!
04145                                                       switch ( gAnimControl[ pTarget->usAnimState ].ubEndHeight )
04146                                                       {
04147                                                             case ANIM_PRONE:
04148                                                                   // two 1/4 chances of avoiding suppression pt - one below
04149                                                                   if (PreRandom( 4 ) == 0)
04150                                                                   {
04151                                                                         break;
04152                                                                   }
04153                                                                   // else fall through
04154                                                             case ANIM_CROUCH:
04155                                                                   // 1/4 chance of avoiding suppression pt
04156                                                                   if (PreRandom( 4 ) == 0)
04157                                                                   {
04158                                                                         break;
04159                                                                   }
04160                                                                   // else fall through
04161                                                             default:
04162                                                                   pTarget->ubSuppressionPoints++;
04163                                                                   pTarget->ubSuppressorID = pBullet->pFirer->ubID;
04164                                                                   break;
04165                                                       }
04166                                                 }
04167 
04168 /*
04169                                                 // this could be a close call
04170                                                 if ( pTarget->bTeam == gbPlayerNum && pBullet->pFirer->bTeam != gbPlayerNum )
04171                                                 {
04172                                                       pTarget->fCloseCall = TRUE;                                       
04173                                                 }
04174                                                 */
04175 
04176                                           }
04177                                     }
04178                               }
04179                         }
04180                   }
04181             }
04182       
04183             // record old tile location for loop purposes
04184             iOldTileX = pBullet->iCurrTileX;
04185             iOldTileY = pBullet->iCurrTileY;
04186 
04187             do
04188             {
04189                   // check a particular location within the tile
04190 
04191                   // check for collision with the ground
04192                   iCurrAboveLevelZ = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ - qLandHeight );
04193                   if (iCurrAboveLevelZ < 0)
04194                   {
04195                         // ground is in the way!
04196                         StopBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04197                         BulletHitStructure( pBullet, INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID, 0, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, TRUE );                     
04198                         return;
04199                   }
04200                   // check for the existence of structures
04201                   if (iNumLocalStructures == 0 && !pRoofStructure)
04202                   {     // no structures in this tile, AND THAT INCLUDES ROOFS! :-)
04203                         // new system; figure out how many steps until we cross the next edge
04204                         // and then fast forward that many steps.
04205 
04206                         iOldTileX = pBullet->iCurrTileX;
04207                         iOldTileY = pBullet->iCurrTileY;
04208                         iOldCubesZ = pBullet->iCurrCubesZ;
04209 
04210                         if (pBullet->qIncrX > 0)
04211                         {
04212                               qDistToTravelX = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ) - (pBullet->qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE ));
04213                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / pBullet->qIncrX;
04214                         }
04215                         else if (pBullet->qIncrX < 0)
04216                         {
04217                               qDistToTravelX = pBullet->qCurrX % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_X_SIZE );
04218                               iStepsToTravelX = qDistToTravelX / (-pBullet->qIncrX);
04219                         }
04220                         else
04221                         {
04222                               // make sure we don't consider X a limit :-)
04223                               iStepsToTravelX = 1000000;
04224                         }
04225 
04226                         if (pBullet->qIncrY > 0)
04227                         {
04228                               qDistToTravelY = INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ) - (pBullet->qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE ));                       
04229                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / pBullet->qIncrY;
04230                         }
04231                         else if (pBullet->qIncrY < 0)
04232                         {
04233                               qDistToTravelY = pBullet->qCurrY % INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( CELL_Y_SIZE );
04234                               iStepsToTravelY = qDistToTravelY / (-pBullet->qIncrY);
04235                         }
04236                         else
04237                         {
04238                               // make sure we don't consider Y a limit :-)
04239                               iStepsToTravelY = 1000000;
04240                         }
04241 
04242                         // add 1 to the # of steps to travel to go INTO the next tile
04243                         iStepsToTravel = __min( iStepsToTravelX, iStepsToTravelY ) + 1;
04244 
04245                         // special coding (compared with other versions above) to deal with
04246                         // bullets hitting the ground
04247                         if (pBullet->qCurrZ + pBullet->qIncrZ * iStepsToTravel < qLandHeight)
04248                         {
04249                               iStepsToTravel = __min( iStepsToTravel, abs( (pBullet->qCurrZ - qLandHeight) / pBullet->qIncrZ ) );
04250                               pBullet->qCurrX += pBullet->qIncrX * iStepsToTravel;
04251                               pBullet->qCurrY += pBullet->qIncrY * iStepsToTravel;
04252                               pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ * iStepsToTravel;
04253 
04254                               StopBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04255                               BulletHitStructure( pBullet, INVALID_STRUCTURE_ID, 0, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, TRUE );
04256                               return;
04257                         }
04258 
04259                         if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON | BULLET_FLAG_FLAME | BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT | BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
04260                         {
04261                               INT8 bStepsPerMove = STEPS_FOR_BULLET_MOVE_TRAILS;
04262 
04263                               if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE ) )
04264                               {
04265                                     bStepsPerMove = STEPS_FOR_BULLET_MOVE_SMALL_TRAILS;
04266                               }
04267                               else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_FLAME ) )
04268                               {
04269                                     bStepsPerMove = STEPS_FOR_BULLET_MOVE_FIRE_TRAILS;
04270                               }
04271 
04272                               for ( i = 0; i < iStepsToTravel; i++ )
04273                               {
04274                                     if ( ( ( pBullet->iLoop + i ) % bStepsPerMove ) == 0 )
04275                                     {
04276                                           fGoingOver = TRUE;
04277                                           break;
04278                                     }
04279                               }
04280 
04281                               if ( fGoingOver )
04282                               {
04283                                     FIXEDPT     qCurrX, qCurrY, qCurrZ;
04284 
04285                                     qCurrX = pBullet->qCurrX + pBullet->qIncrX * i;
04286                                     qCurrY = pBullet->qCurrY + pBullet->qIncrY * i;
04287                                     qCurrZ = pBullet->qCurrZ + pBullet->qIncrZ * i;
04288                   
04289                                     AddMissileTrail( pBullet, qCurrX, qCurrY, qCurrZ );
04290                               }
04291                         }
04292 
04293                         pBullet->qCurrX += pBullet->qIncrX * iStepsToTravel;
04294                         pBullet->qCurrY += pBullet->qIncrY * iStepsToTravel;
04295                         pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ * iStepsToTravel;
04296                         pBullet->iLoop += iStepsToTravel;
04297 
04298 
04299                         // figure out the new tile location
04300                         pBullet->iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( pBullet->qCurrX );
04301                         pBullet->iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_TILE_NUM( pBullet->qCurrY );
04302                         pBullet->iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ ) );
04303                         pBullet->bLOSIndexX = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( pBullet->qCurrX );
04304                         pBullet->bLOSIndexY = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( pBullet->qCurrY );
04305                   }
04306                   else 
04307                   {
04308                         // there are structures in this tile
04309                         iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
04310                         // figure out the LOS cube level of the current point
04311 
04312                         if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF_MAX)
04313                         {
04314                               if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX) 
04315                               {
04316                                     // check objects on the ground
04317                                     sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
04318                               }
04319                               else
04320                               {
04321                                     // check objects on roofs
04322                                     sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
04323                                     iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ -= STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
04324                               }
04325                               // check structures for collision
04326                               for ( iStructureLoop = 0; iStructureLoop < iNumLocalStructures; iStructureLoop++)
04327                               {
04328                                     pStructure = gpLocalStructure[iStructureLoop];
04329                                     if (pStructure && pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel)
04330                                     {
04331                                           if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[pBullet->bLOSIndexX][pBullet->bLOSIndexY] & AtHeight[iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ]) > 0)
04332                                           {
04333                                                 if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_PERSON)
04334                                                 {
04335                                                       // hit someone!
04336                                                       fStopped = BulletHitMerc( pBullet, pStructure, fIntended );
04337                                                       if (fStopped)
04338                                                       {
04339                                                             // remove bullet function now called from within BulletHitMerc, so just quit
04340                                                             return;
04341                                                       }
04342                                                       else
04343                                                       {
04344                                                             // set pointer to null so that we don't consider hitting this person again
04345                                                             gpLocalStructure[iStructureLoop] = NULL;
04346                                                       }
04347                                                 }
04348                                                 else if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW && pBullet->qCurrZ >= qWindowBottomHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ <= qWindowTopHeight)
04349                                                 {     
04350                                                       fResolveHit = ResolveHitOnWall( pStructure, iGridNo, pBullet->bLOSIndexX, pBullet->bLOSIndexY, pBullet->ddHorizAngle );
04351 
04352                                                       if (fResolveHit)
04353                                                       {
04354 
04355                                                             if (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_KNIFE)
04356                                                             {
04357                                                                   // knives do get stopped by windows!
04358 
04359                                                                   iRemainingImpact = HandleBulletStructureInteraction( pBullet, pStructure, &fHitStructure );
04360                                                                   if ( iRemainingImpact <= 0 )
04361                                                                   {
04362                                                                         // check angle of knife and place on ground appropriately
04363                                                                         OBJECTTYPE Object;
04364                                                                         INT32  iKnifeGridNo;
04365 
04366                                                                         CreateItem( pBullet->fromItem, (INT8) pBullet->ubItemStatus, &Object );
04367 
04368                                                                         // by default knife at same tile as window
04369                                                                         iKnifeGridNo = (INT16) iGridNo;
04370 
04371                                                                         if (pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT)
04372                                                                         {
04373                                                                               if ( pBullet->qIncrX > 0)
04374                                                                               {
04375                                                                                     // heading east so place knife on west, in same tile
04376                                                                               }
04377                                                                               else
04378                                                                               {
04379                                                                                     // place to east of window
04380                                                                                     iKnifeGridNo += 1;
04381                                                                               }
04382                                                                         }
04383                                                                         else
04384                                                                         {
04385                                                                               if (pBullet->qIncrY > 0)
04386                                                                               {
04387                                                                                     // heading south so place wall to north, in same tile of window
04388                                                                               }
04389                                                                               else
04390                                                                               {
04391                                                                                     iKnifeGridNo += WORLD_ROWS;
04392                                                                               }
04393                                                                         }
04394 
04395                                                                         if ( sDesiredLevel == STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND )
04396                                                                         {
04397                                                                               AddItemToPool( (INT16) iKnifeGridNo, &Object, -1, 0, 0, 0 );
04398                                                                         }
04399                                                                         else
04400                                                                         {
04401                                                                               AddItemToPool( (INT16) iKnifeGridNo, &Object, -1, 0, 1, 0 );
04402                                                                         }
04403 
04404                                                                         // Make team look for items
04405                                                                         NotifySoldiersToLookforItems( );
04406 
04407                                                                         // bullet must end here!
04408                                                                         StopBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04409                                                                         BulletHitStructure( pBullet, pStructure->usStructureID, 1, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, TRUE );
04410                                                                         return;
04411                                                                   }
04412                                                             }
04413                                                             else
04414                                                             {
04415                                                                   if (pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT)
04416                                                                   {
04417                                                                         if ( pBullet->qIncrX > 0)
04418                                                                         {
04419                                                                               BulletHitWindow( pBullet, (INT16) (pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS), pStructure->usStructureID, TRUE );
04420                                                                               LocateBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04421                                                                               // have to remove this window from future hit considerations so the deleted structure data can't be referenced!
04422                                                                               gpLocalStructure[ iStructureLoop ] = NULL;
04423                                                                         }
04424                                                                         else
04425                                                                         {
04426                                                                               BulletHitWindow( pBullet, (INT16) (pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS), pStructure->usStructureID, FALSE );
04427                                                                               LocateBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04428                                                                               gpLocalStructure[ iStructureLoop ] = NULL;
04429                                                                         }
04430                                                                   }
04431                                                                   else
04432                                                                   {
04433                                                                         if (pBullet->qIncrY > 0)
04434                                                                         {
04435                                                                               BulletHitWindow( pBullet, (INT16) (pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS), pStructure->usStructureID, TRUE );
04436                                                                               LocateBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04437                                                                               gpLocalStructure[ iStructureLoop ] = NULL;
04438                                                                         }
04439                                                                         else
04440                                                                         {
04441                                                                               BulletHitWindow( pBullet, (INT16) (pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS), pStructure->usStructureID, FALSE );
04442                                                                               LocateBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04443                                                                               gpLocalStructure[ iStructureLoop ] = NULL;
04444                                                                         }
04445                                                                   }
04446                                                                   // but the bullet keeps on going!!!
04447                                                             }
04448 
04449                                                       }
04450                                                 }
04451                                                 else if ( pBullet->iLoop > CLOSE_TO_FIRER || (pStructure->fFlags & ALWAYS_CONSIDER_HIT) || (pBullet->iLoop > CLOSE_TO_FIRER) || (fIntended) )
04452                                                 {                                         
04453                                                       if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF)
04454                                                       {
04455                                                             // possibly shooting at corner in which case we should let it pass
04456                                                             fResolveHit = ResolveHitOnWall( pStructure, iGridNo, pBullet->bLOSIndexX, pBullet->bLOSIndexY, pBullet->ddHorizAngle );
04457                                                       }
04458                                                       else
04459                                                       {
04460                                                             fResolveHit = TRUE;
04461                                                       }     
04462 
04463                                                       if (fResolveHit)
04464                                                       {
04465 
04466                                                             iRemainingImpact = HandleBulletStructureInteraction( pBullet, pStructure, &fHitStructure );
04467                                                             if (fHitStructure)
04468                                                             {
04469                                                                   // ATE: NOT if we are a special bullet like a LAW trail...
04470                                                                   if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CORPSE && !( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON | BULLET_FLAG_FLAME | BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT ) ) )
04471                                                                   {
04472                                                                         // ATE: In enemy territory here... ;)
04473                                                                         // Now that we have hit a corpse, make the bugger twich!
04474                                                                         RemoveBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04475                                                                         
04476                                                                         CorpseHit( (INT16)pBullet->sGridNo, pStructure->usStructureID );
04477                                                                         DebugMsg( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("@@@@@@@ Reducing attacker busy count..., CORPSE HIT") );
04478 
04479                                                                         FreeUpAttacker( pBullet->pFirer->ubID );
04480                                                                         return;
04481                                                                   }
04482                                                                   else if ( iRemainingImpact <= 0 )
04483                                                                   {
04484                                                                         StopBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04485                                                                         BulletHitStructure( pBullet, pStructure->usStructureID, 1, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, TRUE );
04486                                                                         return;
04487                                                                   }
04488                                                                   else if (fHitStructure && (gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop] == 0) )
04489                                                                   {
04490                                                                         // play animation to indicate structure being hit
04491                                                                         BulletHitStructure( pBullet, pStructure->usStructureID, 1, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, FALSE );
04492                                                                         gubLocalStructureNumTimesHit[iStructureLoop] = 1;
04493                                                                   }
04494                                                             }
04495                                                       }
04496                                                 }
04497                                           }
04498                                     }                                   
04499                               }     
04500                         }
04501                         // got past everything; go to next LOS location within
04502                         // tile, horizontally or vertically
04503                         bOldLOSIndexX = pBullet->bLOSIndexX;
04504                         bOldLOSIndexY = pBullet->bLOSIndexY;
04505                         iOldCubesZ = pBullet->iCurrCubesZ;
04506                         do
04507                         {
04508                               pBullet->qCurrX += pBullet->qIncrX;
04509                               pBullet->qCurrY += pBullet->qIncrY;
04510                               if (pRoofStructure)
04511                               {
04512                                     qLastZ = pBullet->qCurrZ;
04513                                     pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ;
04514                                     if ( (qLastZ > qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ <= qWallHeight) || (qLastZ < qWallHeight && pBullet->qCurrZ >= qWallHeight))
04515                                     {
04516                                           // generate roof-hitting event
04517                                           // always stop with roofs
04518 
04519                                           if ( 1 /*HandleBulletStructureInteraction( pBullet, pRoofStructure, &fHitStructure ) <= 0 */)
04520                                           {
04521                                                 StopBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04522                                                 BulletHitStructure( pBullet, 0, 0, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ, TRUE );                                        
04523                                                 return;
04524                                           }
04525                                           /*
04526                                           else
04527                                           {
04528                                                 // ATE: Found this: Should we be calling this because if we do, it will
04529                                                 // delete a bullet that was not supposed to be deleted....
04530                                                 //BulletHitStructure( pBullet, 0, 0, pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ );
04531                                           }
04532                                           */
04533                                     }
04534                               }
04535                               else
04536                               {
04537                                     pBullet->qCurrZ += pBullet->qIncrZ;
04538                               }
04539                               pBullet->bLOSIndexX = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( pBullet->qCurrX );
04540                               pBullet->bLOSIndexY = FIXEDPT_TO_LOS_INDEX( pBullet->qCurrY );
04541                               pBullet->iCurrCubesZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrZ ) );
04542                               pBullet->iLoop++;
04543 
04544                               if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TANK_CANNON | BULLET_FLAG_FLAME | BULLET_FLAG_CREATURE_SPIT | BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
04545                               {
04546                                     INT8 bStepsPerMove = STEPS_FOR_BULLET_MOVE_TRAILS;
04547 
04548                                     if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_SMALL_MISSILE | BULLET_FLAG_TRACER ) )
04549                                     {
04550                                           bStepsPerMove = STEPS_FOR_BULLET_MOVE_SMALL_TRAILS;
04551                                     }
04552                                     else if ( pBullet->usFlags & ( BULLET_FLAG_FLAME ) )
04553                                     {
04554                                           bStepsPerMove = STEPS_FOR_BULLET_MOVE_FIRE_TRAILS;
04555                                     }
04556 
04557                                     if ( pBullet->iLoop % bStepsPerMove == 0 )
04558                                     {
04559                                           // add smoke trail
04560                                           AddMissileTrail( pBullet, pBullet->qCurrX, pBullet->qCurrY, pBullet->qCurrZ );
04561                                     }
04562                               }
04563 
04564                         }
04565                         while( (pBullet->bLOSIndexX == bOldLOSIndexX) && (pBullet->bLOSIndexY == bOldLOSIndexY) && (pBullet->iCurrCubesZ == iOldCubesZ));
04566                         pBullet->iCurrTileX = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrX ) / CELL_X_SIZE;
04567                         pBullet->iCurrTileY = FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qCurrY ) / CELL_Y_SIZE;
04568                   }
04569             } while( (pBullet->iCurrTileX == iOldTileX) && (pBullet->iCurrTileY == iOldTileY));
04570 
04571             if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16) (pBullet->iCurrTileX + pBullet->iCurrTileY * WORLD_COLS) ) || (pBullet->iCurrCubesZ > PROFILE_Z_SIZE * 2 && FIXEDPT_TO_INT32( pBullet->qIncrZ ) > 0 ) )
04572             {
04573                   // bullet outside of world!
04574                   RemoveBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04575                   BulletMissed( pBullet, pBullet->pFirer );
04576                   return;
04577             }
04578             
04579             pBullet->sGridNo = MAPROWCOLTOPOS( pBullet->iCurrTileY , pBullet->iCurrTileX );
04580             uiTileInc++;
04581             
04582             if ( (pBullet->iLoop > pBullet->iRange * 2) )
04583             {
04584                   // beyond max effective range, bullet starts to drop!
04585                   // since we're doing an increment based on distance, not time, the 
04586                   // decrement is scaled down depending on how fast the bullet is (effective range)
04587                   pBullet->qIncrZ -= INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( 100 ) / (pBullet->iRange * 2);
04588             }
04589             else if ( (pBullet->usFlags & BULLET_FLAG_FLAME) && ( pBullet->iLoop > pBullet->iRange ) )
04590             {
04591                   pBullet->qIncrZ -= INT32_TO_FIXEDPT( 100 ) / (pBullet->iRange * 2);
04592             }
04593 
04594             // check to see if bullet is close to target
04595             if ( pBullet->pFirer->ubTargetID != NOBODY && !(pBullet->pFirer->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED) && PythSpacesAway( (INT16) pBullet->sGridNo, (INT16) pBullet->sTargetGridNo ) <= 3 )
04596             {
04597                   pBullet->pFirer->uiStatusFlags |= SOLDIER_ATTACK_NOTICED;
04598             }     
04599       } while( uiTileInc < pBullet->ubTilesPerUpdate );
04600       // unless the distance is integral, after the loop there will be a
04601       // fractional amount of distance remaining which is unchecked
04602       // but we shouldn't(?) need to check it because the target is there!
04603 
04604 }
04605 
04606 
04607 
04608 
04609 INT32 CheckForCollision( FLOAT dX, FLOAT dY, FLOAT dZ, FLOAT dDeltaX, FLOAT dDeltaY, FLOAT dDeltaZ, INT16 *pusStructureID, FLOAT *pdNormalX, FLOAT *pdNormalY, FLOAT *pdNormalZ )
04610 {
04611 
04612       INT32       iLandHeight;
04613       INT32       iCurrAboveLevelZ;
04614       INT32       iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ;
04615       INT16       sDesiredLevel;
04616 
04617       MAP_ELEMENT *           pMapElement;
04618       STRUCTURE *             pStructure, *pTempStructure;
04619 
04620       BOOLEAN                             fRoofPresent = FALSE;
04621
