04622       SOLDIERTYPE *           pTarget;
04623       FLOAT                               dTargetX;
04624       FLOAT                               dTargetY;
04625       FLOAT                               dTargetZMin;
04626       FLOAT                               dTargetZMax;
04627       BOOLEAN                             fIntended;
04628 
04629       UINT32                              uiTileInc = 0;
04630 
04631       //INT8                                    iImpactReduction;
04632 
04633       INT16                               sX, sY, sZ;
04634 
04635       FLOAT                               dOldZUnits, dZUnits;
04636 
04637       INT8                                bLOSIndexX, bLOSIndexY;
04638       INT32                               iCurrCubesZ;
04639 
04640 
04641       sX = (INT16)( dX / CELL_X_SIZE );
04642       sY = (INT16)( dY / CELL_Y_SIZE );
04643       sZ = (INT16)dZ;
04644 
04645       // Check if gridno is in bounds....
04646       if ( !GridNoOnVisibleWorldTile( (INT16) (sX + sY * WORLD_COLS) ) )
04647       {
04648       //    return( COLLISION_NONE );
04649       }
04650 
04651       if ( sX < 0 || sX > WORLD_COLS || sY < 0 || sY > WORLD_COLS )
04652       {
04653 //          return( COLLISION_NONE );
04654       }
04655 
04656       // check a particular tile
04657       // retrieve values from world for this particular tile
04658       pMapElement = &(gpWorldLevelData[ sX + sY * WORLD_COLS] );
04659       iLandHeight = CONVERT_PIXELS_TO_HEIGHTUNITS( pMapElement->sHeight );
04660 
04661       // Calculate old height and new hieght in pixels
04662       dOldZUnits = (dZ - dDeltaZ );
04663       dZUnits       =         dZ;
04664 
04665       //if (pBullet->fCheckForRoof)
04666       //{
04667       //    if (pMapElement->pRoofHead != NULL)
04668       //    {
04669       //          fRoofPresent = TRUE;
04670       //    }
04671       //    else
04672       //    {
04673       //          fRoofPresent = FALSE;
04674       //    }
04675       //}
04676 
04677       //if (pMapElement->pMercHead != NULL && pBullet->iLoop != 1)
04678       if (pMapElement->pMercHead != NULL )
04679       { // a merc! that isn't us :-)
04680             pTarget = pMapElement->pMercHead->pSoldier;
04681             dTargetX = pTarget->dXPos;
04682             dTargetY = pTarget->dYPos;
04683             dTargetZMin = 0.0f;
04684             CalculateSoldierZPos( pTarget, HEIGHT, &dTargetZMax );
04685             if (pTarget->bLevel > 0)
04686             {
04687                   // on roof
04688                   dTargetZMin += WALL_HEIGHT_UNITS;
04689             }
04690             if ( sX + sY * WORLD_COLS == pTarget->sGridNo)
04691             {
04692                   fIntended = TRUE;
04693             }
04694             else
04695             {
04696                   fIntended = FALSE;
04697             }
04698       }
04699       else
04700       {
04701             pTarget = NULL;
04702       }
04703       
04704       // record old tile location for loop purposes
04705 
04706       // check for collision with the ground
04707       iCurrAboveLevelZ = (INT32) dZ - iLandHeight;
04708       if (iCurrAboveLevelZ < 0)
04709       {
04710             // ground is in the way!      
04711             if ( pMapElement->ubTerrainID == DEEP_WATER || pMapElement->ubTerrainID == LOW_WATER || pMapElement->ubTerrainID == MED_WATER )
04712             {
04713                   return ( COLLISION_WATER );
04714             }
04715             else
04716             {
04717                   return ( COLLISION_GROUND );
04718             }
04719       }
04720       // check for the existence of structures
04721       pStructure = pMapElement->pStructureHead;
04722       if (pStructure == NULL)
04723       {     // no structures in this tile
04724       
04725             // we can go as far as we like vertically (so long as we don't hit
04726             // the ground), but want to stop when we get to the next tile or
04727             // the end of the LOS path
04728 
04729             // move 1 unit along the bullet path
04730             //if (fRoofPresent)
04731             //{
04732             //    dLastZ = pBullet->dCurrZ;
04733             //    (pBullet->dCurrZ) += pBullet->dIncrZ;
04734             //    if ( (dLastZ > WALL_HEIGHT && pBullet->dCurrZ < WALL_HEIGHT) || (dLastZ < WALL_HEIGHT && pBullet->dCurrZ > WALL_HEIGHT))
04735             //    {
04736             //          // generate roof-hitting event
04737             //          BulletHitStructure( pBullet->pFirer, pBullet->dCurrX, pBullet->dCurrY, pBullet->dCurrZ );
04738             //          RemoveBullet( pBullet->iBullet );
04739             //          return;
04740             //    }
04741             //}
04742             //else
04743             //{
04744             //    (pBullet->dCurrZ) += pBullet->dIncrZ;
04745             //}
04746 
04747             // check for ground collision
04748             if ( dZ < iLandHeight)
04749             {
04750                   // ground is in the way!      
04751                   if ( pMapElement->ubTerrainID == DEEP_WATER || pMapElement->ubTerrainID == LOW_WATER || pMapElement->ubTerrainID == MED_WATER  )
04752                   {
04753                         return ( COLLISION_WATER );
04754                   }
04755                   else
04756                   {
04757                         return ( COLLISION_GROUND );
04758                   }
04759             }
04760 
04761             if ( gfCaves || gfBasement )
04762             {
04763                   if ( dOldZUnits > HEIGHT_UNITS && dZUnits  < HEIGHT_UNITS )
04764                   {
04765                         return( COLLISION_ROOF );
04766                   }
04767                   if ( dOldZUnits < HEIGHT_UNITS && dZUnits  > HEIGHT_UNITS )
04768                   {
04769                         return( COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF );
04770                   }
04771             }
04772 
04773             // check to see if we hit someone
04774             //if (pTarget && Distance2D( dX - dTargetX, dY - dTargetY ) < HIT_DISTANCE )
04775             //{
04776                   // well, we're in the right area; it's possible that
04777                   // we're firing over or under them though
04778             //    if ( dZ < dTargetZMax && dZ > dTargetZMin)
04779             //    {
04780             //          return( COLLISION_MERC );
04781             //    }
04782             //}
04783 
04784       }
04785       else 
04786       {
04787             // there are structures in this tile
04788             iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ = CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( iCurrAboveLevelZ );
04789             // figure out the LOS cube level of the current point
04790 
04791             // CALCULAT LOS INDEX
04792             bLOSIndexX = CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( ((INT32)dX) % CELL_X_SIZE );
04793             bLOSIndexY = CONVERT_WITHINTILE_TO_INDEX( ((INT32)dY) % CELL_Y_SIZE );
04794             iCurrCubesZ = (INT32) CONVERT_HEIGHTUNITS_TO_INDEX( dZ );
04795 
04796             if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF_MAX)
04797             {
04798                   if (iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND_MAX) 
04799                   {
04800                         // check objects on the ground
04801                         sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND;
04802                   }
04803                   else
04804                   {
04805                         // check objects on roofs
04806                         sDesiredLevel = STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
04807                         iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ -= STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF;
04808                   }
04809 
04810                   // check structures for collision
04811                   while (pStructure != NULL)
04812                   {
04813 
04814                         if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ROOF || gfCaves || gfBasement )
04815                         {
04816                               if ( dOldZUnits > HEIGHT_UNITS && dZUnits  < HEIGHT_UNITS )
04817                               {
04818                                     return( COLLISION_ROOF );
04819                               }
04820                               if ( dOldZUnits < HEIGHT_UNITS && dZUnits  > HEIGHT_UNITS )
04821                               {
04822                                     return( COLLISION_INTERIOR_ROOF );
04823                               }
04824                         }
04825 
04826                         if (pStructure->sCubeOffset == sDesiredLevel)
04827                         {
04828 
04829                               if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bLOSIndexX][bLOSIndexY] & AtHeight[iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ]) > 0)
04830                               {
04831                                     *pusStructureID = pStructure->usStructureID;
04832                                     
04833                                     if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLNWINDOW && dZ >= WINDOW_BOTTOM_HEIGHT_UNITS && dZ <= WINDOW_TOP_HEIGHT_UNITS)
04834                                     {     
04835                                           if (pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT)
04836                                           {
04837 
04838                                                 if (dDeltaX > 0)
04839                                                 {
04840                                                       return( COLLISION_WINDOW_SOUTHWEST );
04841                                                 }
04842                                                 else
04843                                                 {
04844                                                       return( COLLISION_WINDOW_NORTHWEST );
04845                                                 }
04846                                           }
04847                                           else
04848                                           {
04849                                                 if ( dDeltaY > 0)
04850                                                 {
04851                                                       return( COLLISION_WINDOW_SOUTHEAST );
04852                                                 }
04853                                                 else
04854                                                 {
04855                                                       return( COLLISION_WINDOW_NORTHEAST );
04856                                                 }
04857                                           }
04858                                     }
04859 
04860                                     if (pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_WALLSTUFF )
04861                                     {     
04862                                           //if ( !CalculateLOSNormal( pStructure, bLOSIndexX, bLOSIndexY, (INT8)iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ, dDeltaX, dDeltaY, dDeltaZ, pdNormalX, pdNormalY, pdNormalZ ) )
04863                                           //{
04864                                           //    return( COLLISION_NONE );
04865                                           //}
04866                                           *pdNormalX = 0;
04867                                           *pdNormalY = 0;
04868                                           *pdNormalZ = 0;
04869 
04870                                           if (pStructure->ubWallOrientation == INSIDE_TOP_RIGHT || pStructure->ubWallOrientation == OUTSIDE_TOP_RIGHT)
04871                                           {
04872 
04873                                                 if (dDeltaX > 0)
04874                                                 {
04875                                                       *pdNormalX = -1;
04876                                                       return( COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHEAST );
04877                                                 }
04878                                                 else
04879                                                 {
04880                                                       *pdNormalX = 1;
04881                                                       return( COLLISION_WALL_NORTHEAST );
04882                                                 }
04883                                           }
04884                                           else
04885                                           {
04886                                                 if ( dDeltaY > 0)
04887                                                 {
04888                                                       *pdNormalY = -1;
04889                                                       return( COLLISION_WALL_SOUTHWEST );
04890                                                 }
04891                                                 else
04892                                                 {
04893                                                       *pdNormalY = 1;
04894                                                       return( COLLISION_WALL_NORTHWEST );
04895                                                 }
04896                                           }
04897 
04898                                     }
04899                                     else
04900                                     {
04901                                           // Determine if we are on top of this struct
04902                                           // If we are a tree, not dense enough to stay!
04903                                           if ( !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_TREE ) && !( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CORPSE ) )
04904                                           {
04905                                                 if ( iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ < PROFILE_Z_SIZE-1 )
04906                                                 {
04907                                                       if ( !((*(pStructure->pShape))[bLOSIndexX][bLOSIndexY] & AtHeight[ iCurrCubesAboveLevelZ + 1 ])  )
04908                                                       {
04909                                                             if ( ( pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_ROOF ) )
04910                                                             {
04911                                                                   return( COLLISION_ROOF );                                                     
04912                                                             }
04913                                                             else
04914                                                             {
04915                                                                   return( COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z );                                                    
04916                                                             }
04917                                                       }
04918                                                 }
04919                                                 else
04920                                                 {
04921                                                       // Search next level ( if we are ground )
04922                                                       if ( sDesiredLevel == STRUCTURE_ON_GROUND )
04923                                                       {
04924                                                             pTempStructure = pMapElement->pStructureHead;
04925 
04926                                                             // LOOK at ALL structs on roof
04927                                                             while ( pTempStructure != NULL )
04928                                                             {
04929                                                                   if (pTempStructure->sCubeOffset == STRUCTURE_ON_ROOF )
04930                                                                   {
04931                                                                         if ( !((*(pTempStructure->pShape))[bLOSIndexX][bLOSIndexY] & AtHeight[ 0 ]) )
04932                                                                         {
04933                                                                               return( COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z );                                                    
04934                                                                         }
04935 
04936                                                                   }
04937 
04938                                                                   pTempStructure = pTempStructure->pNext;
04939                                                             }
04940                                                       }
04941                                                       else
04942                                                       {
04943                                                             // We are very high!
04944                                                             return( COLLISION_STRUCTURE_Z );                                                    
04945                                                       }
04946                                                 }
04947                                           }     
04948                                           
04949                                           // Check armour rating.....
04950                                           // ATE; not if small vegitation....
04951                                           if ( pStructure->pDBStructureRef->pDBStructure->ubArmour != MATERIAL_LIGHT_VEGETATION )
04952                                           {
04953                 if ( !(pStructure->fFlags & STRUCTURE_CORPSE ) )
04954                 {
04955                                                   return( COLLISION_STRUCTURE );
04956                 }
04957                                           }
04958                                     }
04959                               }
04960                         }
04961                         pStructure = pStructure->pNext;
04962                   }     
04963 
04964             }
04965 
04966             // check to see if we hit someone
04967             //if (pTarget && Distance2D( dX - dTargetX, dY - dTargetY ) < HIT_DISTANCE )
04968             //{
04969                   // well, we're in the right area; it's possible that
04970                   // we're firing over or under them though
04971             //    if ( dZ < dTargetZMax && dZ > dTargetZMin)
04972       //          {
04973       //                return( COLLISION_MERC );
04974       //          }
04975       //    }
04976 
04977       }     
04978 
04979       return( COLLISION_NONE );
04980 }
04981 
04982 INT16 gsLOSDirLUT[3][3] =
04983 {
04984       315,        0,          45,
04985       270,        0,          90,
04986       225,  180,        135
04987 };

04990 BOOLEAN CalculateLOSNormal(   STRUCTURE *pStructure, INT8 bLOSX, INT8 bLOSY, INT8 bLOSZ, FLOAT dDeltaX, FLOAT dDeltaY, FLOAT dDeltaZ, FLOAT *pdNormalX, FLOAT *pdNormalY, FLOAT *pdNormalZ )
04991 {
04992       INT32       cntx, cnty;
04993       INT8        bX, bY, tX, tY;
04994       INT8        bNumNormals = 0;
04995       BOOLEAN fParimeter;
04996 
04997       
04998       vector_3          vZ, vTemp2, vNormal, vAveNormal, vTemp, vIncident;
04999 
05000       vZ.x = 0;
05001       vZ.y = 0;
05002       vZ.z = 2;
05003 
05004       vIncident.x = -1 * dDeltaX;
05005       vIncident.y = dDeltaY;
05006       vIncident.z = 0;
05007       // Nomralize
05008       vIncident = VGetNormal( &vIncident );
05009 
05010       vAveNormal.x = 0;
05011       vAveNormal.y = 0;
05012       vAveNormal.z = 0;
05013 
05014       //OK, center on xy and goforit!
05015       for ( cntx = 0; cntx < 3; cntx++ )
05016       {
05017             bX = bLOSX + ( cntx - 1 );
05018 
05019             // Check for boundry conditions, use same as one before boundary
05020             if ( bX < 0 || bX > 4 )
05021             {
05022                   continue;
05023             }
05024 
05025             for ( cnty = 0; cnty < 3; cnty++ )
05026             {
05027                   bY = bLOSY + ( cnty - 1 );
05028 
05029                   if ( bY < 0 || bY > 4 )
05030                   {
05031                         continue;
05032                   }
05033 
05034                   if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bX][bY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0)
05035                   {
05036                         fParimeter = FALSE;
05037                         // THIS MUST BE THE POLYGONAL SURFACE, CHECK!
05038                         do
05039                         {
05040                               tX = (bX - 1);
05041                               tY = bY;
05042                               if ( tX >= 0 )
05043                               {
05044                                     if ( ((*(pStructure->pShape))[tX][tY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) <= 0)
05045                                     {
05046                                           fParimeter = TRUE;
05047                                           break;
05048                                     }                 
05049                               }
05050 
05051                               tX = (bX + 1);
05052                               tY = bY;
05053                               if ( tX <=4 )
05054                               {
05055                                     if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[tX][tY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0)
05056                                     {
05057                                           
05058                                     }
05059                                     else
05060                                     {
05061                                           fParimeter = TRUE;
05062                                           break;
05063                                     }                 
05064                               }
05065 
05066                               tX = bX;
05067                               tY = bY - 1;
05068                               if ( tX >= 0 )
05069                               {
05070                                     if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[tX][tY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0)
05071                                     {
05072 
05073                                     }
05074                                     else
05075                                     {
05076                                           fParimeter = TRUE;
05077                                           break;
05078                                     }                 
05079                               }
05080 
05081                               tX = bX;
05082                               tY = bY + 1;
05083                               if ( tX >=4 )
05084                               {
05085                                     if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[tX][tY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0)
05086                                     {
05087                                     }
05088                                     else
05089                                     {
05090                                           fParimeter = TRUE;
05091                                           break;
05092                                     }                 
05093                               }
05094 
05095                         } while( FALSE );
05096 
05097                         // OK, now add angles, but not the center!
05098                         if (  cntx == 1 && cnty == 1 )
05099                         {
05100 
05101                         }
05102                         else //if ( fParimeter )
05103                         {
05104                               // OK< Calcluate normal using cross-product
05105                               // 1) Calculate Vector2
05106                               vTemp2.x = (float)(bX - bLOSX);
05107                               vTemp2.y = (float)(bY - bLOSY);
05108                               vTemp2.z = 1;
05109 
05110                               // Skip ones ||l to incident vector
05111                               //if ( vTemp2.x == vIncident.x && vTemp2.y == vIncident.y )
05112                               //{
05113                               //    continue;
05114                               //}
05115 
05116                               //2) Calculate Normal from cross product
05117                               vNormal =   VCrossProduct( &vTemp2, &vZ );
05118 
05119                               if ( VGetLength( &vNormal ) > 0 )
05120                               {
05121                                     // Nomralize
05122                                     vNormal = VGetNormal( &vNormal );
05123 
05124                                     // CHECK ANGLE BRTWEEN INCIDENNCE AND NORMAL
05125                                     //if ( VDotProduct( &vNormal, &vIncident ) > 0 )
05126                                     {
05127                                           bNumNormals++;
05128                                           
05129                                           //Average normal!
05130                                           vTemp =     VAdd( &vNormal, &vAveNormal );
05131                                           vAveNormal = VSetEqual( &vTemp );
05132                                           vAveNormal = VDivScalar( &vAveNormal, bNumNormals );
05133                                           // Nomralize
05134                                           vAveNormal = VGetNormal( &vAveNormal );
05135 
05136                                     }
05137       
05138                               }
05139                         }
05140                   }
05141             }
05142       }
05143 
05144       *pdNormalX = 0;
05145       *pdNormalY = 0;
05146       *pdNormalZ = 0;
05147 
05148       if ( bLOSZ < 4 )
05149       {
05150             if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bLOSX][bLOSY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ + 1 ]) > 0)
05151             {
05152                   //*pdNormalZ = -1;
05153             }
05154       }
05155 
05156 
05157       // Average angle
05158       if ( VGetLength( &vAveNormal ) > 0 )
05159       {
05160             *pdNormalX  = vAveNormal.x;
05161             *pdNormalY  = vAveNormal.y;
05162       
05163 
05164             // OK done, now determine direction
05165             if ( dDeltaX > 0 )
05166             {
05167                   *pdNormalX *= -1;
05168             }
05169 
05170             if ( dDeltaY < 0 )
05171             {
05172                   *pdNormalY *= -1;
05173             }
05174 
05175             return( TRUE );
05176       }
05177       else
05178       {
05179             return( FALSE );
05180       }
05181 
05182 }

05186 #if 0
05187 {
05188       INT32       cntx, cnty;
05189       INT8        bX, bY;
05190       INT16       sAngleSum = 0;
05191       INT8        bNumSums = 0;
05192       INT16       sAngleAv;
05193       BOOLEAN fOkX, fOkY;
05194       BOOLEAN     fGoodX, fGoodY;
05195 
05196       //OK, center on xy and goforit!
05197       for ( cntx = 0; cntx < 3; cntx++ )
05198       {
05199             bX = bLOSX + ( cntx - 1 );
05200 
05201             // Check for boundry conditions, use same as one before boundary
05202             if ( bX < 0 || bX > 4 )
05203             {
05204                   fOkX = 0;
05205             }
05206             else
05207             {
05208                   fOkX = 1;
05209             }
05210 
05211             for ( cnty = 0; cnty < 3; cnty++ )
05212             {
05213                   fGoodX = fGoodY = TRUE;
05214 
05215                   bY = bLOSY + ( cnty - 1 );
05216 
05217                   if ( bY < 0 || bY > 4 )
05218                   {
05219                         fOkY = 0;
05220                   }
05221                   else
05222                   {
05223                         fOkY = 1;
05224                   }
05225 
05226                   if ( bY < 0 )
05227                   {
05228                         if ( fOkX )
05229                         {
05230                               bY = 0;
05231                         }
05232                         else
05233                         {
05234                               fGoodY = FALSE;
05235                         }
05236                   }
05237                   if ( bY > 4 )
05238                   {
05239                         if ( fOkX )
05240                         {
05241                               bY = 4;
05242                         }
05243                         else
05244                         {
05245                               fGoodY = FALSE;
05246                         }
05247                   }
05248 
05249                   if ( bX < 0 )
05250                   {
05251                         if ( fOkY )
05252                         {
05253                               bX = 0;
05254                         }
05255                         else
05256                         {
05257                               fGoodX = FALSE;
05258                         }
05259                   }
05260                   if ( bX > 4 )
05261                   {
05262                         if ( fOkX )
05263                         {
05264                               bX = 4;
05265                         }
05266                         else
05267                         {
05268                               fGoodX = FALSE;
05269                         }
05270                   }
05271 
05272                   if ( !fGoodX || !fGoodY )
05273                   {
05274                         continue;
05275                   }
05276 
05277                   if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bX][bY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0)
05278                   {
05279                         // OK, now add angles, but not the center!
05280                         if (  cntx == 1 && cnty == 1 )
05281                         {
05282 
05283                         }
05284                         else
05285                         {
05286                               sAngleSum += gsLOSDirLUT[ cntx ][cnty];
05287                               bNumSums++;
05288                         }
05289                   }
05290             }
05291       }
05292 
05293       // Average angle
05294       if ( bNumSums > 0) 
05295       {
05296             sAngleAv = sAngleSum / bNumSums;
05297 
05298             // This is our normal in XY plane!
05299             // Get unit vector from this
05300             *pdNormalX = cos( ( (float)sAngleAv / 180 ) * PI );
05301             *pdNormalY = sin( ( (float)sAngleAv / 180 ) * PI );
05302 
05303             // OK done, now determine direction
05304             if ( dDeltaX > 0 )
05305             {
05306                   *pdNormalX *= -1;
05307             }
05308 
05309             if ( dDeltaY > 0 )
05310             {
05311                   *pdNormalY *= -1;
05312             }
05313 
05314             if ( bLOSZ == 3 )
05315             {
05316                   // Prependicular
05317                   *pdNormalX = 0;
05318                   *pdNormalY = 0;
05319                   *pdNormalZ = -1;
05320             }
05321             else if ( bLOSZ > 0 && (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bLOSX][bLOSY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ +1 ]) ) == 0)
05322             {
05323                   *pdNormalX = 0;
05324                   *pdNormalY = 0;
05325                   *pdNormalZ = -1;
05326             }
05327             else
05328             {
05329                   *pdNormalZ = 0;
05330             }
05331 
05332             return( TRUE );
05333       }
05334       else
05335       {
05336             *pdNormalX = 0;
05337             *pdNormalY = 0;
05338 
05339             return( FALSE );
05340       }
05341 
05342 }
05343 
05344 {
05345       INT32       cntx, cnty;
05346       INT8        bX, bY;
05347       INT16       sAngleSum = 0;
05348       INT8        bNumSums = 0;
05349       INT16       sAngleAv;
05350       BOOLEAN     fAlongX, fAlongY;
05351 
05352 
05353       fAlongX = fAlongY = FALSE;
05354 
05355       //1) LOOK ALONG X
05356       bX = bLOSX - 1;
05357       bY = bLOSY;
05358 
05359       if ( bX >= 0 && bX <= 4 )
05360       {
05361             if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bX][bY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0 )
05362             {
05363                   fAlongX = TRUE;
05364             }
05365       }
05366 
05367       bX = bLOSX + 1;
05368       bY = bLOSY;
05369 
05370       if ( bX >= 0 && bX <= 4 )
05371       {
05372             if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bX][bY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0 )
05373             {
05374                   fAlongX = TRUE;
05375             }
05376       }
05377 
05378       //1) LOOK ALONG Y
05379       bX = bLOSX;
05380       bY = bLOSY - 1;
05381 
05382       if ( bY >= 0 && bY <= 4 )
05383       {
05384             if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bX][bY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0 )
05385             {
05386                   fAlongY = TRUE;
05387             }
05388       }
05389 
05390       bX = bLOSX;
05391       bY = bLOSY + 1;
05392 
05393       if ( bY >= 0 && bY <= 4 )
05394       {
05395             if (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bX][bY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ ]) > 0 )
05396             {
05397                   fAlongY = TRUE;
05398             }
05399       }
05400 
05401 
05402       if ( fAlongX )
05403       {
05404             *pdNormalY = 1;
05405       }
05406       else
05407       {
05408             *pdNormalY = 0;
05409       }
05410 
05411       if ( fAlongY )
05412       {
05413             *pdNormalX = 1;
05414       }
05415       else
05416       {
05417             *pdNormalX = 0;
05418       }
05419 
05420       // OK done, now determine direction
05421       if ( dDeltaX > 0 )
05422       {
05423             *pdNormalX *= -1;
05424       }
05425 
05426       if ( dDeltaY < 0 )
05427       {
05428             *pdNormalY *= -1;
05429       }
05430 
05431       if ( bLOSZ < 4 && (((*(pStructure->pShape))[bLOSX][bLOSY] & AtHeight[ bLOSZ +1 ]) ) == 0)
05432       {
05433             *pdNormalX = 0;
05434             *pdNormalY = 0;
05435             *pdNormalZ = -1;
05436       }
05437       else
05438       {
05439             *pdNormalZ = 0;
05440       }
05441 
05442       if ( *pdNormalX == 0 && *pdNormalY == 0 && *pdNormalZ == 0 )
05443       {
05444             return( FALSE );
05445       }
05446       else
05447       {
05448             return( TRUE );
05449       }
05450 
05451 }
